name: Dice Forge: The Horn of Plenty promo card
description:
Promotional card offered to the winners of the official "Challenge of the Gods" 2021 qualifying tournament.

This unique card is the only one to offer 3 different effects: immediate, reinforcement (activation), and permanent!

The Horn of Plenty card has 3 types of effects. The immediate effect is on the front of the card. Once the feat is completed, turn the card over to find the reinforcement (activation) and permanent effects on the back.

Immediate Effect: Choose one side of each of your dice. Replace your dice on your Inventory displaying the chosen faces. Apply the powers of the displayed dice faces, as if you were receiving favours from the gods.

Permanent effect: Choose a face on your clear die. Replace it on your Inventory with the chosen side showing and apply its power, as if you were receiving a minor favour.

Reinforcement Effect Activation Condition (activation): After you have been chased by another player.

Reinforcement Effect (Activation): Choose a side on your dark die. Place it back on your Inventory with the chosen face up and apply its power, as if you were receiving a minor favour. Then give this card to the player who kicked you out. He is the new owner (until he is kicked out in his turn).

Important: The immediate effect is only fulfilled when the player who normally performs the feat first acquires the card. Players who get the card by chasing the card owner can only get the permanent and reinforcement (activation) effects.

Note: Only the player who owns the card at the end of the game scores the 10 victory points granted by the card.

name: The Good Shepherd
description: In this super easy-to-learn game, players must try to get the highest scoring Sheep Cards and Pasture Cards. But watch out! Other players will be looking to “Wolf” your cards and “Stampede” your hand. Will you have a Shepherd to protect your flock?

name: By 2s
description:
A Noah's Ark Memory Card Game

Up to four players of all ages will enjoy testing their memory with this fun and relaxing game. The object is to fill your ark (the game board) by finding matching pairs of animals, people, food, wood and tar. Includes 4 game boards (scaled to the dimensions of the ark) and a deck of 80 mini playing cards with original artwork. Game boards and cards are stored in a Noah's ark themed box. Game Boards: 9" x 3"; Cards: 1.75" x 2.5"; Box: 9.25" x 3.25" x 1.5".

On a player's turn. they flip over two cards looking for matches. If the cards match and there is a space on their player board for the pair they can go again. If the two cards do not match play moves to the next player.

The game ends when a single player has filled all the pair slots on their player board.

name: Dragonville
description:
Dragonville is a quick and simple strategy board game for ages 7+.

The Queen Dragon of Dragonville woke up one morning to find all her eggs missing. She soon discovered that her enemies had scattered her eggs around the forest. She has called upon the trusted champions of Dragonville to retrieve her eggs, and fast! “I will reward you all, my clan! Bring as many and as quickly as you can. Some combinations also fetch you more if you plan,” she instructs.
​
Are you going to be thorough, quick, or specific? What's your strategy?

Players race to collect eggs and be the first to complete the course. On their turn, players decide to either move up to two spaces OR roll the dice for a chance to move up to five. Landing on an egg spot first allows the player to pick up the egg.

The game ends when the first player reaches the end of the forest. The player with the maximum points wins the game.
mechanics: Race, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Track Movement

name: Truth or Bull
description:
Truth or Bull is a tactical bluffing and deduction game for 3-10 players.

The Game: Take turns to peek at the Target card. Get maximum points by putting down a card closest to the Target card AND by fooling the majority.
​
But what’s in the Target card? Lie about it or tell the Truth, that is your choice, but the others get to vote and call Bull!

The winner is the player with the maximum points after all players get to be the Active Player.

name: Escargot Sprint
description:
In Escargot Sprint, you play the role of a hungry little snail that spotted a lush garden at the other end of the terrace. But you are not alone, as several other snails will try to get get there first! Your goal is to reach the appetizing greenery before the competition.

In this push-your-luck game, the players will have access to four consecutive decks of cards, coloured green, yellow, orange and red respectively. Starting with the green deck, the player will draw cards, having the option to either stop afterwards or draw a card from the next deck of cards. Each consecutive deck contains more interesting cards that the last while also being more dangerous.

To move forward, the player must draw Raindrop cards in the decks, and will move forward from as many spaces as the number of raindrops they drew that turn. But the decks also contain Sun cards that will force the player to move their snail backwards and end their turn immediately.

There are also several item cards, such as the Salad, which prevent the player from moving backwards when drawing Sun cards, or the Umbrella, which prevents another player from moving during their turn.

The first snail to reach the garden wins!

name: OverDrive: Rival Pack – Tigrax vs Shadow
description:
The Rival Pack for OverDrive contains everything you need to add two new players to your overdrive teams.

Tigrax stalks the arena, looking for its latest victim, while Shadow’s advanced programming allows it to turn the opponent’s attacks against them with devastating results.

Includes:
1x Resin Tigrax
1x Resin Shadow
2x Tri-Hex Bases
2x Player Cards (Large Size)
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction

name: OverDrive: Coach Abilities and Sponsorship Cards
description:
As you learn powerful new Coach Abilities and earn lucrative Sponsorship Deals during an OverDrive League, use these cards as a handy reminder during matches.

40x Coach Abilities and Sponsorship Deals cards

Rules for Coach Abilities and Sponsorship Deals are included in the core rulebook. These cards are a player aid to make sure you don’t forget your abilities and deals during play!
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction

name: Family Plot: Endangered Orphans Booster Pack
description:
Endangered Orphans/Family Plot Crossover Cards (3 Cards)

These cards were created in honor of our "beloved" orphan creators and depict the world's most majestic creature . . . well . . . destroying them. It's what we've all dreamed of, right? We also have to warn you, they are not for KIDS! So, grab them while you can!
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Mature / Adult
mechanics: Hand Management, Push Your Luck, Take That

name: Holly Jolly: Candy Canes Promo Cards
description:
Shuffle the Candy Canes into your tinsel and lights deck. These count as "wild" cards, meaning they can be used as tinsel or lights when adding up your value totals.

There are six Candy Cane cards with the following value breakdown:

Two 5 value cards
Two 4 value cards
Two 3 value cards

Included in the Tantrum House season 8 promo Kickstarter.
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Hidden Victory Points, Set Collection

name: 1066: Tears to Many Mothers – Ceorl Saxon promo card
description:
French promo card released as a free print and play on the Nuts! Publishing website.

Ceorl Saxon: Saxon, Infanterie, Milice

Quand joué: Rusé - Epulsez 1 unité ennemie se trouve dans l'aile de cette carte.

Un ceorl était l'homme libre de rang le plus bas dans la société anglo-saxonne pré-normande, pas un paysan mals un home possédant des armes.

Ceorl Saxon: Saxon, Infantry, Militia

When Played: Ruse - Knock out 1 enemy unit in the wing of this card.

A ceorl was the lowest-ranking freeman in pre-Norman Anglo-Saxon society, not a peasant but a man with arms.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Medieval, Print & Play, Wargame

name: Star Scrappers: Cave-in – Legendary Mercenaries
description:
Six legendary mercenary cards and six supporting information cards for the Cave-In game from the Star Scrappers: Orbital Kickstarter.

The six legendary mercenaries are:
- Hy'dran What'err
- Metanel Adjunkt
- Terron Quartermaster
- Mineggler Harmonyx
- Weedlock Fertilizer
- Bioss Dominatrix
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management, Modular Board, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Take That

name: Longfish
description:
Longfish is a children's fish building card game with the goal of creating the longest fish! Elements of memory and push-your-luck to find and build the longest fish.

From a grid, flip over one card at a time to build a complete fish, a complete fish must have one head and one tail and may have two additional middle-body parts. Once a fish is complete you can either take the cards or keep flipping cards to add body parts (push your luck style). If a non-matching fish part is flipped, return all flipped cards face-down (memory style).

Game ends when all 12 fish have been built.
The winner is the one with the most cards.

The game includes 36 playing cards and 4 rule cards.

Longfish can be played in 3 different modes: match, build, and fish.

name: Schichtwechsel: Sol- & Thermalbad Expansion
description:
The mini expansion introduces a second miner and another player action card into the Game.

Sol- & Thermalbad is an 2021 exclusive expansion from the "Herner Spielerzentrum".

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action Points, Worker Placement, Worker Placement, Different Worker Types

name: The Acts: Heroes of the Faith
description:
Heroes of the Faith allows you to take on the role of important figures from the book of Acts. Each hero provides you with a special ability.

Includes 8 Hero cards and rules for play.

name: BattleTech: Spotlight On Crimson Seeker Star
description:
In the right place, a few small rocks can change the course of a river. The Seekers of Clan Goliath Scorpion and the Escorpion Imperio have long sought out relics of the past which they believe will steer their course. But relics are not the only rocks: one small unit and its warriors changed the path of the Clan and the Imperio. The saKhan of fifty years who formed them. The Star Colonel who returned to guide them in their darkest hour. The survivors who escaped the Reavings to claim a new home. Those who continue to use the relics of the past to guide the future. Come discover the small rocks of the Crimson Seeker Star, who changed the course of the Seekers, the Goliath Scorpions, the Escorpion Imperio and many more.

Spotlight On: Crimson Seeker Star includes a Unit History, Personalities, Personnel Rosters, Mission Tracks, and data for use with all scales of BattleTech play.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BAM!: Fußball-Spezial
description: This is an expansion pack for BAM! of 5 red and 17 grey cards that are all themed around soccer.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game

name: Operation Barbarossa Army Group Center
description:
It is June 1941. The Third Reich embarks upon the greatest military campaign of all time. The Wehrmacht attacks across an 1800 mile front, 3.8 million men, 3350 tanks, 3000 aircraft, and 23,000 artillery pieces.
Now, as a tactical commander in the most significant campaign of the 20th century, it is up to you to win your battles, and shape the world, before it's too late!
(This is a Combat Boots game. Each unit represents a squad, individual gun, tank, or aircraft. Each space is 50 meters across, and each turn is approximately 5 minutes long. Best played face-to-face, but the game includes provisions for solitaire play)
categories: Modern Warfare, Wargame, World War II

name: Silk: Shin Ookami Promo
description:
The first edition of Bitoku contains 2 promo's: one for Bitoku itself and a second one for Silk.

It's an improvement tile that will replace one of the original ones, as you can still only have 4 in a game.

Rules:

Each time the ookami is able to send three or more silkworms to her cave in the same move, the player whose turn it is may decide, in addition, to place a silkworm of their own color on the Shin Ookami tile, either from their reserve or from the Ookami’s den.

At the end of the game, during the final scoring, the player with the most silkworms on the Shin Ookami will get 5 points +1 additional point for each silkworm of their color on that tile.

If a player has no silkworms left in their reserve, they can use the “Raise a Silkworm” action to get a silkworm back from the Shin Ookami tile and return it to their own reserve (just like silkworms are rescued from the Ookami’s den).

name: BattleTech: Historical – Liberation of Terra vol 1
description:
In 2766, decades of careful planning and manipulation finally culminated when Stefan Amaris wiped out the entire Cameron dynasty in a bloody coup. Rallying the might of the SLDF behind him, General Aleksandr Kerensky immediately attacked Amaris' Rim Worlds Republic, before turning his full fury against the Usurper's "Empire"? launching one of the greatest military campaigns in Inner Sphere history.

Historical: Liberation of Terra, Volume 1 describes the early years of the civil war that would ultimately bring about the final end of the first Star League. Covering the fighting from the coup itself to the bloody campaign for the Terran Hegemony, this book provides a hard look at the closing years of the Star League Era, and the fateful decisions that would eventually pave the way for centuries of Succession Wars to come.

Battletech Historicals series delves into the pivotal wars of the Inner Sphere’s thousand-year history, with important personalities, maps of individual attack waves and regiment listings, along with a campaign framework that allows players to enact every aspect of each of these important events.

name: BattleTech: Historical – Liberation of Terra vol 2
description:
In 2777--after ten years of savage fighting in the Periphery--General Alaksandr Kerensky and the Star League Defense Force launched the final phase in the war against Stefan Amaris, the Usurper of the Star League. For two more years, the greatest army ever forged by humankind would wage a planetby-planet war for the heart of the League itself, ultimately landing on mankind's homeworld of Terra. As the single greatest campaign ever fought in human history, Operation LIBERATION would change the fate of generations to come.

Historical: Liberation of Terra, Volume 2 describes the final years of the civil war that ultimately brought about the end of the first Star League. Covering the fighting that followed Kerensky's conquest of the Rim Worlds Republic and the early stages of the Hegemony campaign to the final conclusive battles on Terra itself, this book provides a hard look at the last days of the Star League Era, and the fateful decisions that would eventually pave the way for centuries of Succession Wars to come.

Battletech Historicals series delves into the pivotal wars of the Inner Sphere’s thousand-year history, with important personalities, maps of individual attack waves and regiment listings, along with a campaign framework that allows players to enact every aspect of each of these important events.

name: BattleTech: Historical Turning Points – Glengarry
description:
The assassination of Archon Melissa Steiner-Davion in 3055 sent shockwaves throughout the Federated Commonwealth. In the secessionist Isle of Skye, it lit the fires of rebellion once again. The Free Skye Separatist movement brought things to a boil in April 3056 on the insignificant world of Glengarry. Only one obstacle stood in their way: the venerable Gray Death Legion mercenary command.

With the bulk of the vaunted mercenaries stationed elsewhere, the Skye Separatists believed the planet Glengarry would fall quickly. The cadets and reserve units of the Gray Death Legion, under the command of Alexander Carlyle, son of their decorated leader Grayson Carlyle, had a different opinion. What followed was a savage guerilla war, with the fate of Glengarry and the entire Isle of Skye region hanging in the balance...
Historical Turning Points: Glengarry extracts the details from the classic Gray Death Legion scenario book Day of Heroes and the novel Blood of Heroes and represents it in the phenomenally successful Jihad Turning Points PDF exclusive format. Return to an earlier time in BattleTech history, when rumors of rebellion and strife threaten to tear apart the fabric of the mighty Federated Commonwealth!

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios. This PDF exclusive includes a detailed map of the world of Glengarry, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: The Magnificent: Promo-pack
description:
This promo-pack consists of the Master Tiles that were released previously and 3 new master cards. It was first for sale at Spiel 2021 in Essen and is available through the webshop of Matagot.

Each master card will have as a bonus that for 3 coins you can move the wagon 1 to 3 spaces and the card scoring is 2 VP for each pip of a certain die color. Each master card will be for one specific color (as well wagon as die): green, orange or purple.
mechanics: Contracts, Dice Rolling, End Game Bonuses, Grid Coverage, Movement Points, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Square Grid, Tile Placement, Track Movement, Turn Order: Stat-Based, Variable Player Powers

name: BattleTech: Operational Turning Points – Death to Mercenaries
description:
During the Fourth Succession War, the fiercest fighting lay along the contentious Draconis March, pitting the elite DCMS not against the forces of the Federated Suns, but against a singular mercenary enemy: Wolf's Dragoons. The firestorm that erupted on Misery fanned the hatred of Coordinator Takashi Kurita, who gave his now-famous "Death to Mercenaries!" edict and directed nearly the entire might of the Galedon Military District against the three worlds garrisoned by the Dragoons.
Operational Turning Points: Death to Mercenaries picks up where Historical Turning Points: Misery leaves off, opening up the battle for players to join in the fight using the successful Turning Points PDF exclusive format. Return to one of the defining moments of Dragoon lore as they held the line against the honorable samurai of the Dragon.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual Missions and Touchpoints, following a campaign arc, and inserting it into their own campaigns. This PDF exclusive includes detailed information on the worlds involved, a rundown of the forces involved in the conflict, an overview of the historical campaign, and several tools and tracks that players can use to run historical characters and battles from this time period. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Historical Turning Points – Luzerne
description:
Never really considered a major blip in the newly-created Second Star Leagues' plan, Luzerne--through simple chance--became listed in the history books as one of the longest and desperate campaigns during Operation BULLDOG. The former Combine system became the defining moment for Clan Smoke Jaguar on the eve of their demise. Battered and beaten, the Clan fought tooth and nail to hold on to Luzerne even as the remains of their Occupation Zone fell in tatters.

Historical Turning Points: Luzerne looks at the pivotal battle that defined the Second Star League's Operation BULLDOG and spelled the end of the most vicious Clans occupying the Inner Sphere. Return to BattleTech's recent past, when the Inner Sphere's newly-united realms embarked on their own crusade to rid themselves of Clan Smoke Jaguar.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, or inserting it into their own campaigns. This PDF exclusive includes a detailed map of the planet of Luzerne, a rundown of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-Star battles or recreate the entire gamut of Operations BIRDDOG and BULLDOG on Luzerne. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Operational Turning Points – Revival Trials
description:
In late 3048, Kerensky's Clans voted to invade the Inner Sphere. The leaders of Clan Wolf, staunch opponents of the invasion, immediately called for a Trial of Refusal against the vote. Desperate to prevent invasion, the Wolves faced incredible odds and the might of four opposing Clans. After the Refusal, all seventeen Clans met in a series of bitterly fought Placement Trials to determine who would spearhead the invasion. However, not all of the Clans that remained behind in Clan space were happy with the trials' outcome. In 3049, once the invasion began in earnest, Clan Ice Hellion took matters into its own hands.

Operational Turning Points: REVIVAL Trials puts players in the middle of the most pivotal events in Clan history. Using the Turning Points PDF exclusive format, players can fight the Wolves' iconic Trial of Refusal, vie for a coveted Operation REVIVAL invasion corridor, or wage war against their neighbor Clans.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Turning Points – Epsilon Eridani
description:
Blake's Blessed Avenging Angels
In the wake of the Jihad and Devlin Stone's creation of the Republic of the Sphere, the ancient Order of ComStar was transformed. Their once-proud Com Guards were disbanded, never to rise again. Gone were the robes, the religion, the chants?Վ_--and the Word of Blake. But deep within the shattered Order remained a secret outlasting the long decades of peace: the Com Guard reborn...and with it, hidden believers in the old ways of ComStar.

In 3135, the secret of the Com Guard and their Blessed Order got out. With the Inner Sphere torn apart by the HPG Blackout, the reformed Com Guard found itself in an epic battle against the Republic of the Sphere, their very survival at stake.

Turning Points: Epsilon Eridani uses Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even creating their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games an Epsilon flavor. The PDF exclusive includes a detailed map of the world of Epsilon Eridani, a rundown of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles or stage a planetary invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – Luthien
description:
THE BLACK PEARL UNDER SIEGE
Luthien. The Black Pearl. Jewel of the Dragon. The center of the Draconis Combine, Luthien had never been conquered by an enemy in over four centuries.

Then came the Jihad.

Jihad Turning Points: Luthien fleshes out the details of the conflict surrounding this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of units fighting for control--and survival--of the Combine's capital world. Enemies from within and without seek to cut off the Dragon's head, while loyal samurai fight to save it.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a Luthien flavor. The ebook includes a detailed map of the world of Luthien, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – New Avalon
description:
AVALON DARKENED
In 2796 New Avalon almost fell to the ravening Draconis Combine. Yet House Davion rebounded, becoming one of the most powerful of Houses. Since then Avalon City and the capital of the Federated Suns have stood as a beacon of hope for all mankind.

Then came the Jihad.

Jihad Turning Points: New Avalon fleshes out the details of the conflict surrounding this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of forces fighting for control--and survival--of the Federated Sun's capital world.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a New Avalon flavor. The ebook includes a detailed map of the world of New Avalon, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – Tharkad
description:
THARKAD ABLAZE
Seat of power for the Lyran people since 2407, the frozen shores of Tharkad have sparkled with the might of the merchant princes of House Steiner for centuries.

Then came the Jihad.

Jihad Turning Points: Tharkad fleshes out the details of the conflict surrounding this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of forces fighting for control--and survival--of House Steiner's seat of power.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a ˆ_Ñ??Tharkad flavor.ˆ? The ebook includes a detailed map of the world of Tharkad, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – Sian
description:
SIAN ABLAZE!
The most important world in the Capellan Confederation, the verdant and serene capital has been the seat of the Chancellor's power for centuries.

Then came the Jihad. And more damaging, the betrayal of one of Liao's own blood.

Jihad Turning Points: Sian fleshes out the details of the conflicts that swirl across this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of forces fighting for control--and survival--of the center of House Liao's heart and soul.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a ˆ_Ñ??Sian flavor.ˆ? The ebook includes a detailed map of the world of Sian, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – Atreus
description:
ATREUS CAST DOWN
Despite centuries of unrest, the Free Worlds League (formed in 2271) is the oldest of all the Great Houses. Its capital, Atreus, colonized during humankind's initial exodus to the stars, is held as the ideal of the democracy prized by the people of the League.

Then came the Jihad.

Jihad Turning Points: Atreus fleshes out the details of the conflict surrounding this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of forces fighting for control--and survival--of the Free Worlds League's capital world.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a ˆ_Ñ??Atreus flavor.ˆ? The ebook includes a detailed map of the world of Atreus, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage up to a world-wide invasion. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Jihad Turning Points – Dieron
description:
Dieron. Prefecture capital, District headquarters, a lynchpin resource and industrial world for the mighty Draconis Combine.

One of the Word of Blake's major successes at the onset of the Jihad, they would not let go of Dieron without a fight.

Jihad Turning Points: Dieron fleshes out all the details of the conflict surrounding this pivotal world published in various Jihad Plot Sourcebooks. Additionally, players can join one of the myriad of units fighting for ultimate control of one of the Dragon's precious resource worlds. The Word of Blake has turned the world into a major stumbling block, centered around the ancient and massive Fortress Dieron.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even creating their own scenarios with optional rules to give their games a "Dieronese flavor." This PDF-exclusive book includes a detailed map of Dieron, a comprehensive list of the forces involved on Dieron during its nine-year occupation, and several Tracks for players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles or stage a complete world-wide invasion. The only limit is the players' imagination.

name: BattleTech: Operational Turning Points – The Red Corsair
description:
In 3055, an unknown pirate menace threatened several Lyran border worlds. Known only as the ˆ_Ñ??Red Corsair,ˆ? this brutal pirate leader broke several militias and preyed upon its victims with no mercy. In response to ComStar's pleadings, forces from Clan Wolf and the famed mercenary Kell Hounds pursued the mysterious pirate band across several Lyran worlds to a climactic showdown deep in Clan Wolf space.

Operational Turning Points: Red Corsair opens up the battle for players to join in the fight (as detailed in Michael Stackpole's novel Natural Selection) using the successful Turning Points PDF exclusive format. Return to a time when tensions were high along the Lyran-Falcon border, and one wrong move might spark another interstellar war!

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual Missions and Touchpoints, following a campaign arc, and inserting it into their own campaigns. This PDF exclusive includes detailed information on several of the worlds affected by the Red Corsair, a rundown of the forces involved in the conflict, an overview of the historical campaign, and several tools and tracks that players can use to run historical characters and battles from this time period. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: BattleTech: Historical Turning Points – Misery
description:
Wolfs' Dragoons, one of the Inner Sphere's most enigmatic mercenary units in the early thirty-first century. The Draconis Combine Mustered Soldiery, one of the most honorable and ruthless military forces among the Great Houses. On the tiny planet of Misery, the culmination of political plotting, jealousy, and fanaticism played itself out to a bloody, exhaustive end.
The extension of the stubborn wills of Jaime Wolf and Takashi Kurita, Misery became a bloody milestone in the history of the Dragoons and a shocking embarrassment to the Dragon's throne. Forever after, Misery became synonymous to both forces as a symbol of pain, dishonor, and unshakable devotion.

Historical Turning Points: Misery returns to an earlier time in BattleTech history, when the mysterious Dragoons were manipulated into a life-or-death battle by the jealousy of a Kuritan warlord, and nearly paid the ultimate price just to survive.

This campaign series uses the Chaos Campaign rules and gives players the option of fighting individual battles, following a campaign arc, inserting it into their own campaigns and even create their own scenarios. This PDF exclusive includes a detailed map of the world of Misery, a run down of the forces involved in the conflict, and several tracks that players can use to run simple lance-on-lance battles, or stage the complete, desperate battle for survival. Only the players' imaginations are the limits.

name: Renaissance Wars: Masterpiece Edition Expansion
description:
The Masterpiece Edition expands the game into a 5 or 6 player game. It may also be used in a standard 2-4 player game with modification of the envelopes.

Masterpiece cards can be used in conjunction with standard cards to complete standard Melds or on their own to complete Masterpiece melds providing ways to score even more points.

Contents:

14 Masterpiece cards
1 Rules sheet w/Masterpiece Meld Guide


This expansion was available as an add-on during the Kickstarter campaign and later through the publisher website.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Renaissance
mechanics: Hand Management, Set Collection, Trick-taking, Variable Player Powers

name: Euro Champions
description:
Euro Champions is a card game for 2 to 6 players who have an eye for dominate European football.

In Euro Champions, the tradition and fortune of European clubs will motivate your actions in every round. Your goal is to conquer the most Points Shields. For this players need to make a combination of cards that have enough stars of tradition or fortune to conquer each shield.

In addition, players can also collect cards of clubs from the same country or region and acquire valuable characters to help them or harm their opponents.

And to make everything even more fun and interactive, there's the "Penalty card" that will leave everyone's heart in their mouths!

An exciting and strategic game without being heavy, for 2 to 6 players, to be played with friends, family and find out who is capable of dominating European football!
mechanics: Deck Construction, Hand Management, Open Drafting, Set Collection, Take That

name: 消えたパンツと空飛ぶサカナ (Kieta Pantsu To Soratobu SAKANA)
description:
This game is called Murder Mystery. The player becomes one of the characters in the story and searches for the culprit of the incident that occurs in the story. Since the criminal is also one of the players, the purpose is that the player who became the criminal does not know that he is the criminal.
Each player has his or her own purpose other than searching for the criminal or not knowing it, and each player aims to achieve multiple goals and win the points obtained by achieving them.

"Kieta Pantsu To Soratobu SAKANA -Lost Panties And Fish Fly In The Sky-" is a Murder mystery where five friends living in a share house search for the whereabouts of their lost panties. This story has a shocking impact on everyone.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Hidden Movement, Hidden Roles, Hidden Victory Points, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Negotiation, Semi-Cooperative Game, Storytelling, Traitor Game

name: BattleTech: Battle of Tukayyid Supplemental
description:
The Battle of Tukayyid campaign book brings the pivotal conflict of the Clan Invasion to life in stunning grandeur. But the Tukayyid experience is too exciting to be contained in a single volume, and this Supplemental expands upon the options within that book.

Two sections dig further into BattleTech lore, allowing players to use the full range of mapsheets and record sheets published to date, while a Battlefield Support: Combined Arms Worksheet makes those rules easier to use.

Additionally, over two hundred record sheets cover every ’Mech included in the Battle of Tukayyid campaign book. Finally, a Strategic BattleForce expansion includes the rules, maps, and Formation Record Sheets to use the rules in Interstellar Operations to play out the Battle of Tukayyid with large-scale games.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: Die Legenden von Andor: Magische Helden – Die Magie von Choranat
description:
Single card expansion for Die Legenden von Andor: Magische Helden.

Die Magie von Choranat gives bonus magic to the heroes.

name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Warriors of Kerensky I
description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Clans. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Clan Invasion Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, callsign, and quote was also based on details submitted by Clan Invasion Kickstarter backers.

name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Card Pack I
description:
Pack contains 9 double-sided MechWarrior pilot Cards, for a total of 18 named MechWarriors.

• Yurika Suzume/Mackenzie Cross
• Robert Otek/Tracy Maxwell Kent
• Scotty Rosek/Sawako Maki
• Garrett Cedeno/Cole
• Odilon Rodriguez/Jorma Mercer
• Jillian Snuka/Audrey
• Jevanrod Ward/Rauf Icaza
• Trent Leroux/Geertruida
• Reshondra Descatris/Vaiana

A Clan Invasion Kickstarter exclusive, Card Pack I was known as MechWarrior Pilots II during the crowdfunding campaign.

name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Champions of the Inner Sphere I
description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.

name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Mercenaries of the Inner Sphere II
description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.

name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Heroes of the Clan Invasion
description:
This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.

This deck was originally listed as Mechwarrior Pilot Deck: Battle of Tukayyid during the crowdfunding campaign.

name: Renaissance Wars: Radiant Luminaries Set
description:
This is a set of two additional Luminaries, Leonardo da Vinci and Johannes Gutenberg. Each Luminary comes with its own player mat, card, and portrait token. They may be integrated into the base game without modification to the rules.

This set was only available by pledging at the Renaissance pledge level or higher during the kickstarter.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Renaissance
mechanics: Hand Management, Set Collection, Trick-taking, Variable Player Powers

name: British vs Pirates: Volume 2 – Lost Treasure of Dantes
description:
This PDF download is a single player voyage where you will find 4 Chapters of rich storyline that will test your might in ship combat vs the evil NPC (non player control). As you complete each Chapter you'll receive SPECIAL CARDS for that faction that may be used in other game modes!

All of this content is digital and printable, or you may simply reference the PDF while you play. Requires British vs Pirates Volume 2.

name: BattleTech: Dig, Defend or Die
description:
Stotzing was not an easy planet to settle. The first colony, Eisenstadt, failed after less than a decade and its location was lost to historians for almost five centuries. The final throes of The Jihad caused the announcement of the discovery to be relegated to the small number of archaeologists and historians interested in lost colonies. But there was one other group that caught wind of this discovery—the Green Ghosts

Dig Defend or Die was the 2018 BattleTech World Wide Event depicting the clash between the Green Ghosts and the First Marik Defenders. Includes the Total Warfare and Alpha Strike scenario as well as the final results of the event.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Experimental Technical Readout – Primitives vol 1
description: Experimental Tech Readout: Primitives, Volume 1 samples the early technology designs that dominated the universe of BattleTech during the pre-Star League Age of War period. Each design featured in this book demonstrates the primitive technology level of the first generation of BattleMechs, the last generation of Combat Vehicles (before the 'Mech supplanted them), and the low-tech aerospace units that flew above them. Although many were ultimately upgraded to ˆ_Ñ??modern standardsˆ? and shown in Technical Readout: 3075, the units featured here reflect these designs as they were when first introduced to the universe they fought for. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 Primitive BattleMechs, vehicles, aerospace units presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Experimental Technical Readout – Boondocks
description:
Experimental Technical Readout: Boondocks samples the custom and prototype designs that have begun to turn up on the lesser-known worlds of the BattleTech universe. Each design featured in this book incorporates some of the latest technologies developed by the realms of the Inner Sphere as the war against the Word of Blake continues.

These technologies--first described in Tactical Operations--have yet to achieve widespread production, but each has been prototyped and rushed to the field for their desperate consumers. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 new experimental BattleMechs, vehicles, and aerospace units presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.

name: BattleTech: Experimental Technical Readout – Liao
description:
Experimental Technical Readout: Liao samples the custom and prototype designs that have begun to turn up in testing labs and top-secret proving grounds of the Capellan Confederation. Each design featured in this book incorporates some of the latest technologies developed by the realms of the Inner Sphere as the war against the Word of Blake continues.

These technologies--first described in Tactical Operations--have yet to achieve widespread production, but each has been prototyped and rushed to the field for their desperate consumers. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 new experimental BattleMechs, vehicles, aerospace units, and battle armor designs presented in this book, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.

name: BattleTech: Experimental Technical Readout – Mercs
description: Experimental Technical Readout: Mercs highlights a sample of the prototype designs that have begun testing in the BattleTech universe during the Jihad. Each design featured in this book incorporates some of the latest technologies to debut in the war against the Word of Blake, as first described in Tactical Operations. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 13 new experimental BattleMechs, vehicles, and fighters, ready for play in advanced BattleTech games.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: BattleTech: Era Digest – Dark Age
description: Era Digest: Dark Age is a mini-sourcebook that explores the pivotal developments in the immediate aftermath of the HPG Blackout, giving players a glimpse at early reactions to the crisis and the rise of the splinter factions fighting to take advantage of the chaos. Complete with rules and stats for several Dark Age units, Era Digest: Dark Age also features role-playing support for this crucial setting in BattleTech history!
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: Herbarium
description:
Herbarium is a board game designed for you to become a herbarium designer and create the most beautiful bottles! A herbarium is an ornamental item made by stuffing dried flowers in small bottles and soaked in special oils.

In this game, you'll combine 8-color flower chips to create a role and compete for a highest score. The purchasing phase and the fair phase will be repeated, and the first player to win two gold medals in the Fair Phase will win.

The bottle contains up to three materials, and the combination of the three colors can be used in various roles. In addition, let's aim for a high score by making good use of the "trendy color" of the season and "push color" that only the judges know.

If you only care about your work, other players will have an advantage, so purchase while looking at the situation of the players around you.


『Herbarium』はハーバリウムデザイナーとなって、誰よりも美しい作品を作ることを目的とした、思考と視覚で楽しむボードゲームです。ハーバリウムとはドライフラワーなどを小瓶に詰め、専用のオイルに漬けた観賞用のアイテムです。
このゲームでは８色の花のチップを組み合わせて役を作り、より高得点を競います。
仕入れフェイズと品評会フェイズを繰り返し進行していき、品評会フェイズで最初に金賞を２回受賞したプレイヤーの勝利となります。

瓶には最大３つの素材が入り、その３つの色の組み合わせによって様々な役が成立します。
また、そのシーズンの「流行色」や審査員しか知らない「推し色」などを上手に利用して高得点を狙いましょう。
自分の作品ばかり気にしていると、他のプレイヤーが有利になってしまうので周りのプレイヤーの状況をうかがいながら仕入れましょう。

最初に金賞を２回受賞したプレイヤーの勝利となります。

name: Lese-Polizei: Einsatz in Wimmelstadt
description:
Alarm in Wimmelstadt! A gang of thieves is roaming the streets and squares, stealing everything they can get their hands on.
This is a case for the clever reading police! They quickly have a look at the city and follow the clues read to them by the head of police. He tells them where they can find an important witness, a partner in crime, or a crime scene. With these clues they can find the perpetrators and the loot.

Listen carefully and look closely, and you can find the clues you're looking for, with a bit of luck, you can catch all the bags from the robbery boss and stop to the thieves. But beware: if the boss of the thieves has most of the loot in his hiding place, the thieves have won.

This game playfully promotes reading and listening skills
of children in preschool and first reading age. Since the game also requires close observation, it also improves the ability to concentrate.

name: Exhibition: 20th Century – Variation Showcases
description:
Add 1 or more of these VARIATION SHOWCASES to the players' exhibition halls. Possibly on top of base game showcases, to replace those.

The 6 new showcases are:


Showcase ANTIQUITY (2 spots) for 5/4/3/2/1(0) victory points: Who has the oldest year in the right side spot?
Showcase UNIQUE DECADES (2 spots): Each decade must differ from the earlier placed decades of all players (including yourself) in this showcase. (With 4, 3 or 2 players, only the respectively middle 8, 6 or 4 decades are allowed. (So with 2 players only the 30s, 40s, 50s and 60s.)
Showcase SHORT ERA (3 spots) for 5/4/3/2/1(0) victory points: Who has the smallest difference in years between the left and the right side spot.
Showcase ONE DECADE (3 spots): All cards in this showcase must have the same decade.
Showcase SPREAD THE YEARS (4 spots): The difference between neighboring cards must be 20 years or more.
Showcase LINKS (4 spots): Each 2 neighboring cards must have OR the same continent OR maximum 5 years difference. (or both)


—description from the publisher

name: Robothlon
description:
Dice management board game for 2 to 5 players.

In Robothlon you will have to guide your Robot to conquer the highest number of medals by participating in different Competitions, installing new Upgrades and selecting your Targets.

Modify the results obtained by making your Robot's skills interact with the values of the dice and use the Programs to solve the most complicated situations.
categories: Card Game, Dice, Math, Science Fiction, Sports
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Modular Board, Open Drafting, Turn Order: Pass Order

name: Battle of TaiYuan
description:
The Battle of TaiYuan puts you on a WWII battlefield in China. You will command your army to fight the enemy.

This is an introductory-level wargame. The game rules are simple and easy to learn. It is very suitable for beginners.

The biggest feature of this game is the combat mechanism. Players can concentrate their units to increase their attack power. They can also disperse their units and cause more losses to the enemy.

—description from the designer

name: Versus: The Gleaners vs Paris Street – Rainy Day
description:
A game with a fast paced mechanic based on puzzling in which players try to put in his/her turn as many pieces of his/her painting in an area delimited by a frame.

Each player has a different puzzle but one condition is always true: they both has the same cutting pattern. As there is not enough space for all the pieces of inside the frame, on his turn a player try to put as many pieces as he/she can in order to contribute the most to the whole puzzle, which will result a hybrid of both images.

The game ends when the frame is completed. The winner is the player who has put more pieces inside the frame.
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Pieces as Map, Real-Time

name: Ihr Herz schlug Schlager
description:
State of emergency in Schlagerland! Everyone who was anyone in the industry had come together for the new edition of the "Schlager-Megaparade".

But shortly before the recording began, singer Janine Bayer was found dead. She was supposed to present her new No. 1 hit "Ich träum von mir heut Nacht" that evening.


Story



State of emergency in Schlagerland! Everyone who was anyone in the industry had come together for the new edition of the "Schlager-Megaparade". The Christmas edition of Germany's most successful TV entertainment show was to be recorded in midsummer of all times. For it neither costs nor efforts were spared! Presenter and pop star Michael Prinz would again present a mix of well-known stars and promising newcomers. The show with snow cannons and a skating reindeer ballet should not only provide for Christmas mood in the living rooms of the spectators, but also strongly boost the record sales of the performing artists.

The recording began punctually at 6:30 p.m. in the sold-out Magdeburg Stadthalle. All the artists were eagerly awaiting their turn. But shortly after the show began, a shrill scream echoed through the hall: a production assistant had found the artist Janine Bayer dead in her dressing room. The singer, who had won the industry award "Der Goldene Gockel" a few weeks ago, was supposed to present her new No. 1 hit "Ich träum von mir heut Nacht" that evening.

Of course, you immediately called an ambulance and the police. But the emergency services that were called in could only determine Janine's death. Apparently, the victim was beaten to death with her own prize statue. While you now wait for your interrogation, you are left on your own with the question: What happened that day? How could this hit fest end so tragically?


Players



4 female and 3 male roles (with 7 people). Male roles can be played by women and vice versa.
mechanics: Acting, Hidden Roles, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Storytelling

name: Wiz'N'Bang
description:
Wiz’N’Bang is a tower-building and defence card game for 2-4 players that takes 15-30 minutes to play.

Players take on the role of a wizard attempting to construct the perfect tower on the perfect hill, the problem being every other wizard trying to do the same.

During turns players use Action Points to perform a selection of different Actions. These include: Moving your wizard up or down your tower. Making use of tower cards such as Cannons, Dragons, Portals, and more, to construct your tower one floor at a time in the most offensive or defensive way you please. Using a wide selection of spells such as Fireball, Counter, Deadeye, and more, to defend your precious tower against the nefarious machinations of your enemies.

The winner is the player who can successfully build a tower seven cards high and get their wizard to the top.

Simple in concept but with amazing depth, Wiz’N’Bang brings together card drafting, tower building, dice rolling, meeple management, and spell casting into a delightfully small package that won’t break the bank or hog the table.
categories: Card Game, Dice, Fantasy, Humor, Territory Building
mechanics: Action Points, Action/Event, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Movement Points, Open Drafting, Race, Turn Order: Progressive

name: Ja Ci pokażę Junior
description:
Ja ci pokażę JUNIOR is a charades-based party game for teams of two or more players. It contains cards with items, animals, emotions and professions.

In a game, one of a team members take turns trying to get their teammates to guess as many words from the cards as possible.

There is way of showing in one side of the card and picture on the other side of the card. One player turns around top card and has to show or tell the word in a special way (i.e. only showing with no words or by using only sounds). If the team guesses they get the card as a point. If nobody can´t guess the word and time is up, next team plays.

When the preprepared deck runs out the team with the most points is the winner.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Acting, Communication Limits, Move Through Deck

name: Escape Game avec Maelys
description:
Help Maëlys and Lucien to get out of the castle before midnight, by solving the puzzles in each room. Hurry, because the clock is ticking, but keep your eyes peeled for clues! Hours of play ahead to have fun all year round!

For 1 to 4 players. From 7 years old. A superb big game: 1 large castle to assemble, 180 puzzle cards, 9 envelopes, 1 red filter, 1 mirror card, 1 Maëlys and Lucien pawn, 1 magnifying glass, 1 clock, 1 hourglass, 1 notepad.
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Solo / Solitaire Game, Targeted Clues

name: Artifact: Expanded Rules
description: Expanded rules published in Space Gamer #34 (Dec. 1980) add new weapons and equipment as well as bases and a point system for design your own scenarios.

name: Puffin Rock: Spin & Find
description:
Puffin Rock: Spin & Find game was developed to help children strengthen their memory and practice memory techniques. There are two ways of playing it - an easier and a more advanced mode.

The game has a spinner and tiles with characters. The characters are represented on the tiles multiple times in different environments and poses. The goal of the game is to find and get as many tiles as possible.

In the basic game mode, children first mark the back of the tiles. They can draw their unique markings, shapes and doodles that will help them remember what is on the other side. The tiles are then placed face-down. In the second part of the game they spin the spinner and find the character that the arrow points to among the face-down tiles. The player with the most tiles at the end of the game wins.

In the advanced game mode, extra tiles are added, with only some tiles marked, and additional rules apply that make the game even more challenging.

The rules include additional variants for a single player and cooperative gameplay.

—description from the publisher

name: Timeline: Polska – Kaszuby
description:
A unique set of 10 additional cards that will expand your set of Timeline: Poland cards with events related to the history of Kashubia. Prepared in two languages ​​(on the one hand, the event cards are described in Polish, on the other - in Kashubian) and decorated with unique graphics, they are an interesting variety and allow us to expand our knowledge even more.

The set was created in cooperation with the Kashubian-Pomeranian Association.


Wyjątkowy zestaw 10 kart dodatkowych, które rozszerzą Twój zestaw kart do gry Timeline: Polska o wydarzenia związane z historią Kaszub. Przygotowane w dwóch językach (z jednej strony karty wydarzenie opisane jest po polsku, z drugiej - po kaszubsku) i ozdobione unikalnymi grafikami stanowią ciekawe urozmaicenie i pozwalają jeszcze bardziej poszerzyć naszą wiedzę.Zestaw powstał we współpracy ze Zrzeszeniem Kaszubsko-Pomorskim.
categories: Card Game, Educational, Expansion for Base-game

name: Planszówkowi Kurierzy
description:
Kids are waiting for board game elements. Will you help deliver them to their homes? Dice by trains, pawns by truck or maybe cards by ship? You decide what to load on the available vehicles. The person who does it most efficiently will be the winner.

The game combines fun with the development of a child's math skills: it teaches counting up to 20, orders of magnitude and simple fractions. The players' task is to fill their vehicles with game elements and deliver them to homes from all over the world.

name: Neimhaim
description:
Neimhaim is a 1 to 7 player cooperative game based on the popular saga of Nordic fantasy novels by Aranzazu Serrano Lorenzo. Players control brave heroes who must unite the peoples of the Forbidden Peninsula - the brave Kranyal warriors and the peaceful Djendel priests - before winter falls upon them. The games have an average duration of 45 minutes.

The objective of the game is to drive out the invaders and restore the Alliance in all villages. If you succeed... congratulations! You have all won!

Neimhaim is a fantasy literature saga with a Nordic setting, an epic saga enriched with the force of Viking myths and the mystery of Celtic culture. A unique and original universe endowed with an extensive ‘world building’ that includes illustrations, original designs and maps. Recommended for youth and adult audiences.

name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Fantastic Four Empyre Miniatures Game
description:
Based on the earth-shattering Empyre event, this HeroClix miniatures game contains the Avengers, Fantastic Four, X-Men, and more!

Play up to 8 campaign scenarios for 2 players where results matter from session to session or sit down for a head to head single match of raw power! Each of the 10 beautiful ready to play figures comes with two different ways to play for hundreds of different combinations. Excellent point of entry for the first time miniatures player! Map components are thick double sided tiles and the box includes everything you need to play!

This boxed-set is a great way for 2 players to learn HeroClix! Existing players will definitely want to pick up this product since it includes tournament-worthy figures and interesting scenario gameplay!
categories: Collectible Components, Comic Book / Strip, Dice, Miniatures
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Jewish Card Revoked
description:
Every round, players read aloud a card with subjective questions about Jewish culture such as "What's the most stereotypical sign of Jewish neuroticism?" and "What topic do you dread discussing with your relatives but know will come up?" Everyone holds up their A,B, C, or D voting cards to vote on their favorite answer.

Then someone from the majority opinion and each minority opinion gets 45 seconds or less to defend their answer. A re-vote occurs to see if anyone was convinced, and the answer is majority rule. Players all start with 10 points, and every time they disagree with the majority, they get a point deducted. The next round, players dive into another humorous question about Jewish culture or religion.

The player with the most points wins.

name: Operation RI
description:
Operation RI is a print and play wargame of moderate complexity for one or two players, simulating the Japanese overland advance on Port Moresby in 1942 and the subsequent Allied counter-offensive.

Components (need to be printed, the counters require assembly):

Rulebook

Charts and tables

Set up cards

2 x maps (recommended print size 11" x 17" each)

1 x half sheet of double-sided unit counters and markers (74 combat units and 12 markers)

1 x half sheet of double-sided strength markers (88 strength markers)

Historical background and designer's notes

Comprehensive and illustrated examples of play

Scale: battalion and company

Map: point-to-point movement

Time frame: weekly turns

Solitaire suitability: very high

Design features: battle fatigue, jungle and mountain warfare, Allied air transport, Japanese bunker defences.

The Japanese have a chance to capture Port Moresby via the overland route using their seasoned infantry from the South Seas Force. The terrain will make it a difficult task. If they fail, the Allied forces will launch a counter-attack with the aim of driving the Japanese into the sea.

The system focuses on the effect prolonged periods of combat in difficult terrain had on combat units. Units which fight for too long without respite are vulnerable to counter-attack. Each side must manage their forces with respect to fatigue, which represents combat exhaustion and ammunition expenditure, and the inherent logistical difficulties this campaign posed.

Can the Japanese capture Port Moresby? In this simulation they can, but it is difficult.

Also challenging is the task of crushing the Japanese beachheads on the north coast.

Purchase via direct digital download at : https://www.wargamevault.com/product/379181/Operation-RI?src...
categories: Print & Play, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Point to Point Movement, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Postcard Civil War East
description:
Postcard Civil War East is a little postcard size/format Strategic level board-wargame about the American Civil War in the East to mail/give to family & friends.
6 turns per year, 1861-65, but just a single year's campaign can be played. 7 Union and 5 Confederate pieces. Lots of Fog of War, Jackson's Foot Cavalry II Corps while it lasts, etc. A one-year campaign plays in ... 15 minutes? ... so the 5-year war (unless someone wins sooner) ... 75 minutes?
Simple, basic mechanics.

(Union player:) "Wherrre's Jackson?!"

—description from the designer
categories: American Civil War, Bluffing, Civil War, Educational, Post-Napoleonic, Print & Play, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Hidden Movement, Movement Points, Push Your Luck, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Secret Unit Deployment, Simulation, Variable Phase Order, Variable Set-up

name: Paul Koenig's The Bulge Deluxe Edition
description:
Paul Koenig’s The Bulge is a system containing seven separate competitive introductory level wargames covering the German 1944 winter offensive known as “The Battle of the Bulge.” As a special bonus, it also includes the German May 1940 attack upon Sedan against the French army.

This Deluxe Edition is an expansion to Paul Koenig's THE BULGE 6th Panzer Army, first published by VPG. It includes the following scenarios ...

5th Panzer Army - SE section of map
6th Panzer Army - NE section of map
7th Army Extension
​The Combined Game (5 & 6 PZA)
The Campaign Game - entire map (16 December to 26 December 1944)
Army Group B 1944 - NW section of map (23 December to 26 December 1944)
Army group A 1940 - SW section of map (11 May to 15 May 1940)

Each scenario has its own Exclusive Rules while each uses the same Standard Rules.

The design of these games is loosely based upon Paul Koenig’s D-Day and Market Garden series.

name: Paupers' Ladder: Bon-bons
description:
First off, happy Christmas to you all!

This little print and play expansion adds the following to a game of Paupers' Ladder or The Moon Towers:

CRACKERS
Your Pauper will start the game with 3 Crackers. Some contain gifts, others tricks. Invite other players to pull a cracker with you when you occupy the same Region.

SPECIAL QUESTS
Each Pauper now comes with a Special Quest only they can complete. This contains updated versions of the Special Quests from the Christmas In Brighton expansion, plus Special Quests for all the Paupers from The Moon Towers and the Bodachs from The Brighthelm Bodachs.

name: BattleTech: Era Report – 3062
description: Era Report: 3062 describes the state of the Inner Sphere and the Clans at a divisive period in BattleTech history: the latter years of the Clan Invasion. Presented as a general overview of the period, rather than a focused report on a single conflict, this book includes descriptions of many major Inner Sphere, Periphery, and Clan factions. Notable personalities, military forces, and an overview of the technological capabilities of the Inner Sphere and Clan powers of this critical period in history are also provided, along with special advanced-level rules for campaigns set in this era, whether played using the Total Warfare core rules or those found in A Time of War: The BattleTech RPG.

name: BattleTech: Handbook – House Kurita
description: Handbook: House Kurita cover the pivotal history, politics and cultures of the Inner Sphere's most feared Great Houses. Not just a sourcebook, Handbook: House Kurita covers rules for both BattleTech and A Time of War game play, including such areas as personal equipment, support vehicles, creatures and more.

name: Cartoon Network Crossover Crisis: Professor Utonium Promo Card
description:
Cartoon Network Crossover Crisis: Animation Annihilation Deck building game - Professor Utonium Promo Card.

At the start of each of your turns you may put a card with cost 4 or less from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

name: Star Fleet Battles Commander's Rulebook Update II
description:
A 64-page rulebook expansion for Star Fleet Battles: Commander's Rulebook.

This product was designed to be taken apart and integrated into the previous volumes of the rulebook.

Update #2 includes a compilation of SFB material that had previously appeared in other sources, such as Nexus magazine. Much of this material has been updated and revised for Update #2, and some entirely new material is also included.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Impulse Movement, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Simulation, Simultaneous Action Selection
publishers: Amarillo Design Bureau, Inc., Task Force Games

name: Conflict of Heroes: Kursk '43 – Nordfront
description:
A Missions Expansion for Conflict of Heroes: Storms of Steel – Kursk 1943 (Third Edition)

This expansion is centered on the battle near the towns of Ponyri and Olkhovatka, which both sides considered as vital positions.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

name: Quest: Volume I
description: Quest: Volume I is a game with 2,520 general knowledge questions: World, Arts and Entertainment, Society, Science and Technology, Sport and Leisure and Variety. Before answering each question, the player must bet the amount of points he wants to walk on the board if he gets the answer right. Players can even choose the topics they know best to answer. But it's good to know all the subjects, as in the end you'll have to answer a question on the topic chosen by the other players. Are you up for this challenge?

name: Golazo: Managers Expansion Pack
description:
The Managers Expansion Pack comes with cards that add ten managers to the game.

Each of the Golazo Managers has 3 special abilities to give you an advantage over your opponent! Choose your manager at the start of the game. You can only use each card once, so use them wisely!

Note: each of the 10 managers has their own special ability cards that are different from those of the other managers.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Coverage, Movement Points

name: Slash & Spells
description:
How will you build your Victory?

Slash & Spells is a Hero Building Battleground. Embody your Legendary Hero and unlock your unique ability tokens using magical Relics across the realm. Command clever card play and take ever-evolving heroic actions.

Slash & Spells is an epic duel using action selection, variable player powers, and hero tech trees tied into your relic choices. Players control unique Heroes drawn into an epic battle during your turn you take 6 basic actions to grow in power, attack, move, play cards from your unique hero deck, and ultimately knock down your enemies by reducing their health to zero.

The battle takes place via attack actions and playing cards from your hand. Each card that resolves deals their base Dmg and card effects to their target. Once a card has been played its card effect becomes an available action for your hero to take.

Victory is yours when you claim the most Knockdowns by the end of rounds and can claim your true destiny!

-description from designer
mechanics: Action Drafting, Action Points, Area Movement, Command Cards, Hand Management, Hexagon Grid, Once-Per-Game Abilities, Resource to Move, Tech Trees / Tech Tracks, Turn Order: Stat-Based, Variable Player Powers

name: Mont-à-Mots Mini
description:
Help climber Sam reach the yeti at the top of the mountain in this cooperative vocabulary game.

Sam needs your speed and your vocabulary to overcome obstacles and reach the top of the mountain. Roll the dice, find out on a map the challenge you will have to meet and each time you succeed, Sam can move a little further towards his goal.

Players pick a challenge card off the draw stack and roll a die to see how many words they must recite to meet the challenge. If no one can pick a correct word, they must roll the die and move back that many spaces.

Who wins? Whichever team or player first gets Sam to the top of the mountain.


Un jeu de vocabulaire coopératif
Aidez l’alpiniste Sam à rejoindre le yéti au sommet de la montagne!Amateurs de jeu de mots, voilà votre chance de briller aussi en alpinisme avec Sam, qui a besoin de votre rapidité et de votre vocabulaire pour franchir les obstacles et atteindre le sommet de la montagne. Lancez le dé, découvrez sur une carte le défi que vous aurez à relever et chaque fois que vous réussissez, Sam peut avancer un peu plus vers son but.

Qui l’emporte? L’équipe ou le joueur qui, le premier, permettra à Sam d’atteindre le sommet de la montagne.

name: Regenerate!
description:
Regenerate! is a collaborative resource management game that teaches players about regenerative land management, sustainable development, and systems thinking.

The game is played over 20 Rounds during which teams design and deploy Projects that allow them to gain resources (Water, Energy, Food, and Capital) and score points with the Community. All resources must be managed efficiently and Community Score is used to assess the team’s performance at the end of the game.

Maintain regenerative conditions at Fly Ranch as you strategically develop the land, engage with the community, and manage natural and anthropogenic disturbances.

—description from the publisher

name: Unsere Nationale Volksarmee im Manöver
description:
Each player has 9 infantry units (Gruppe), 3 tanks (Panzer), 3 Anti-tank guns (PAK) and 3 grenade launchers (Werfer), wich are set up on opposite sides of the game board on the corresponding spaces. Movement is figure per turn. The pieces have different movement capabilities and shooting ranges. Some spaces cause terrain modifications.

A piece eliminates an enemy piece if it gets near enough to place the enemy piece inside its shooting range. Exception: a grenade launcher can't hurt a tank.

The goal of the game is to eliminate al enemy pieces to win the game.

—user summary
mechanics: Grid Movement, Point to Point Movement

name: Moosehead
description:
Doppelkopf for Two

From the rules:

Object
Twenty-three tricks are played each hand; certain cards are worth certain points; the object is to capture the most points. There are bonuses for catching your opponent’s Ace of trump and for winning the last trick with the Jack of Clubs.
The Cards
The 48 card deck is made from a double pack that has been shortened by removing cards below 9: so each of the four suits contain two each of A K Q J 10 9.

In most contracts, the cards rank, from high to low:

Trumps: ♥10, ♣Q, ♠Q, ♥Q, ♦Q, ♣J, ♠J, ♥J, ♦J, ♦A, ♦10, ♦K, ♦9 (26 cards)
Clubs: ♣A, ♣10, ♣K, ♣9
Spades: ♠A, ♠10, ♠K, ♠9
Hearts: ♥A, ♥K, ♥9

The cards have values:

A = 11 10 = 10 K = 4 Q = 3 J = 2

making a total of 240 card points. The basic object of the game is to take more than half of these card points in tricks. The card points are used to determine which team has won the round - they are not the same as game points which are written on the score-sheet as a result of winning or losing.

name: Mr Canoehead
description:
The unholy hybrid of Euchre & Doppelkopf (for 2 players)
Mr. Canoehead, a quintessentially Canadian superhero: on a canoeing trip in Algonquin Park, he was hit by lightning while portaging his aluminum canoe, which became permanently welded to his head. As a crime fighter, he would capture criminals by turning around so that the canoe knocked them over.

Object
Sixteen tricks are played each hand; the object is to capture the most tricks. There are bonuses for catching your opponent’s Left Bower (dunking their donut) and for winning the last trick with the 6 of Trumps (the timbit).

name: Ducktail
description:
Ducktail is a new game in the Schafkopf family, for 2 players.

Seventeen tricks are played each hand; certain cards are worth certain points; the object is to capture 61+ points. There are bonuses for capturing 9s (especially the 9 of trumps); there are additional bonuses for winning the last trick with a 9.

A pack of 36 cards is used consisting of A K Q J 10 9 8 7 6 in four suits (hearts, diamonds, clubs and spades). 

Half of the pack (18 cards) is trumps. The face cards are promoted to be permanent top trumps (ranked in a specific order, by suit) with all the rest of the cards, in a named trump suit, ranking below them.

name: Copyright
description:
Use 36 cards ranking AKQJT9876 in each suit, plus 3 Jokers distinguished as Red, Black, and White. Deal 13 cards each in ones.

The objective is to win tricks and enable your right-hand neighbour to win more than the player on your left. The player with the greatest number of tricks that matches these conditions, wins.

Dealer's left-hand neighbour leads to the first trick. You must follow suit if you can, but may otherwise play any card. The trick is taken by the highest card of the suit led, or by the highest trump if any are played, and the winner of each trick leads to the next.

You score the number of tricks you won multiplied by the number won by your right-hand neighbour.

name: Numeralia
description:
The game contains two types of cards: levels (with numbers from 1 to 9) and balloons (with addition and subtraction operations; for example, a balloon card with a three has both "+3" and "- 3").

Each player starts with 6 cards after mixing the two decks, and one card of each type is placed in the center of the table. In turns, each player can throw all the level cards they want, as long as the number that appears on them is the same as the one on the level card on the table, or the result of applying any of the operations to said number of the balloon letter. You can also shoot balloon cards if it makes it possible to shoot another level card later.

The player who first runs out of cards in hand wins a star. The one with the most stars will win the game.

name: Monopoly: At Home Reality
description:
Make the most of being stuck at home with the Monopoly At Home Reality game. This family board game celebrates the new way of living. Board spaces are rooms in the house -- the bedroom is the office, the living room is the movie theater, and the kitchen is the school.

The gameplay is similar to the standard Monopoly board game but with humorous differences. Tokens can't share a space because of social distancing, and players will want to watch out for the screaming child because they'll have to pay to entertain the kid.

This version of the Monopoly game makes the most of life at home with social distancing and missed activities like visiting a movie theater, yoga studio, and more.

HILARIOUS TOKENS: Racecar with parking boot, Rubber duck with babies, T-Rex with boxer shorts, smaller dog, penguin with coffee cup, Cat with bath cap.,
UPDATED UTILITIES AND HOME-THEMED BOARD SPACES: In this family board game, WiFi and video streaming are necessary utilities, and board spaces are places in the home, such as the kitchen turned school.
AVOID THE SCREAMING CHILD: When a player moves their token, they also move the screaming child; if the tokens land on the same space, the player must pay to entertain the screaming child.


"Community Chest" becomes the "Community Cupboard". Chance is still called Chance, but is now illustrated with boxes shipped from online orders.

The money tweaks the classic design to look like a house, and each denomination features different food items inside the 'house'.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: The Legend of Zelda: Barcode Battler II – Dice Mode
description:
The Legend of Zelda Barcode Battler II: Dice Mode version had an extra mode that could be played without the Barcode Battler II - just with the cards and dice. It is a single-player experience wherein you grow stronger, roll dice, and explore a pyramid of enemies to defeat Ganon.

You arrange the cards in a pyramid then work from the outside (from a position you decide) inwards, collecting items and trying to out-roll the monsters to collect hearts and level up. Defeating Ganon marks the end of the game.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Player Powers

name: IQ ringas: Nr. 1
description:
Card game IQ Ring: No. 1 is an educational question-and-answer game. The game consists of a set of 78 cards with questions, 12 special cards to track the score and an answer book. Each question card contains 3 questions of different difficulty. The first question is worth 1 point, the second 2 points and the third 3 points.
The game progresses in a clockwise direction. The player on the left draws a card and reads the topic. The player then chooses one of the 3 questions and tries to answer it. If the answer is correct, the player goes as far as the question was worth. If incorrect, stay standing or go back if indicated on a special card. The winner is the one who first scores 12 points.
This game can be expanded with IQ Ring: No. 2 and IQ Ring: No. 3 cards.

Kortelių žaidimas "IQ ringas: Nr. 1" – tai lavinamasis edukacinis klausimų ir atsakymų žaidimas. Žaidimą sudaro 78 kortelių rinkinys su klausimais, 12 specialiųjų kortelių skirtų rezultatui sekti ir atsakymų knygelė. Kiekvienoje klausimų kortelėje yra po 3 skirtingo sudėtingumo klausimus. Pirmas klausimas vertas 1 taško, antras – 2, trečias – 3 taškų.
