The 02 Hundred Hours: Operation Torchlight expansion features new models and 24 unique cards, including including options to field Royal Marine Commandos!

The top secret Special Operations Executive assembles expert teams for the most dangerous objectives. A courageous SOE agent receives intelligence that an RAF pilot has been lost carrying vital reconnaissance photographs. The Highland Major, famed for his tracking skills, hand-picks a force of Royal Marine Commandos for the rescue mission. A demolitions expert is added to provide an explosive diversion while an SOE assassin eliminates targets quickly and quietly...
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Action Points, Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Measurement Movement

name: 02 Hundred Hours: Guards of Facility 9
description:
The 02 Hundred Hours: Guards of Facility 9 expansions contains new models and 24 unique cards, including the "It's a Trap" event to turn the tables on the attackers!

At a classified location in Western Europe, German scientists carry out chemical research to create deadly new weapons. The facility is overseen by the officious commandant, ably assisted by his adjutant and a wounded veteran officer who has been reassigned away from the front line. Guards patrol the facility wearing gas masks to protect themselves from the toxic fumes while a sinister Gestapo officer keeps a watchful eye on everyone...

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Action Points, Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Measurement Movement

name: Middara: Unintentional Malum – Vestalia 2023 Resin Kit A
description:
Kill monsters, get loot, and level up.... in a bikini.

This product contains 5 highly detailed resin miniatures, featuring Damocles, Rook, Justice, Shayliss, and Remi.

These miniatures may be used as alternate sculpts for their corresponding figures in Middara: Unintentional Malum - Act I.

All characters include full color initiative cards, adventurer cards, art cards, and 9 new items for use in your games of Middara.

—description from the publisher

name: Middara: Unintentional Malum – Vestalia 2023 Resin Kit B
description:
The sexier the armor, the better the stats.

This product contains 5 highly detailed resin miniatures, featuring Padric, Nightingale, Zeke, Effie, and Zafir.

These miniatures may be used as alternate sculpts for their corresponding figures in Middara: Unintentional Malum - Act I﻿.

All characters include full color initiative cards, adventurer cards, art cards, 1 familiar card and 8 new items for use in your games of Middara.

These models come unassembled and unpainted.

—description from the publisher

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Cenobite Thurible and Cenobite Leotard Promo Cards
description:
This is a set of two promo gear cards, the Cenobite Thurible, and the Cenobite Leotard. They were included with the Dark Of Star miniature, which itself is not part of the game.

Cenobite Thurible (Item, Lantern, Other) - Archive a death token: For your next attack this round, use the accuracy, strength, and speed of a dead survivor in your campaign in place of your own.

Cenobite Leotard (Armor, Leather, Metal) - Ignore the frenzy brain trauma.
On arrival, gain a death token for each permanent injury you have recorded.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Wild Wits
description:
Play until your "Wits End"

The game is played by drawing cards and swapping them with the cards in your tableau. The goal is to get the fewest points at the end of the game. The game ends when After the eighth round any player declares that they are done or the draw pile is exhausted. The points are tallied and the player with the lowest total wins.

Obtain the LOWEST point total by one of SIX scoring methods.

Setup

Players are each dealt 8 cards. 4 face down (no peeking) and four face up. The remaining cards are placed face down as the draw pile. One card is turned over to start the discard pile.

NEVER LOOK AT THE FACE DOWN CARDS

There are four suits. Blue, green, red and yellow.

Play

The player to the left of the dealer starts.

On your turn you MUST draw the top card from either the draw pile or the discard pile. You may replace one of your cards with the card that you drew.

Play continues counter clockwise for a minimum of 8 turns. After 8 turns any player on their turn can vocalize "WITS END". The other players have one more turn to try to reduce their points total.

Scoring. (The important part)

1 regular points
2 all color bonus
3 all star bonus
4 four or more bonus
5 split color bonus
6 straight shot bonus

name: Dixit: Disney Edition – Chip 'n Dale Promo Card
description:
Included in Dixit: Disney Edition – Promo Cards, but it was released/given out as a single card at conventions like Spiel Essen 2023.

Promo card for the game Dixit: Disney Edition.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game

name: Dixit: Disney Edition – Olaf Promo Card
description:
Included in Dixit: Disney Edition – Promo Cards, but it was released/given out as a single card at conventions like Spiel Essen 2023.

Promo card for the game Dixit: Disney Edition.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Party Game

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Compact Quiver and Killjoy Promo Cards
description:
This is a set of gear card and secret fighting art. They were included with the Sylvania miniature, which itself is not part of the game.

The Compact Quiver (item, leather) has the following ability: Bows and arrows this gear points to gain +2 accuracy. If this gear points to 2 or more arrows, bows this points to lose cumbersome.

Killjoy (Secret fighting art) grants the following ability:
While you have 25+ insanity, your first failed wound attempt each attack still wounds the monster. (The attempt is still a failure and causes the monster to perform FAILURE.)

When you are a returning survivor you kill all other survivors in the settlement with 25+ insanity.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Seed Pattern Gear #041 Promo Cards
description: This is a set of a Seed Pattern card and the corresponding Seed Pattern Gear art. They were included with the Halloween Survivors - King Costume miniature, which itself is not part of the game.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Five Parsecs From Home: Fixer's Guidebook
description:
Armed with this third expansion in the series, you will be able to expand and modify your game to offer new and exciting possibilities as well as undertake new missions, making the world of Five Parsecs more detailed and elaborate than ever before! Join a faction and get rewarded doing jobs for them alone, but beware as things hot up on the streets when they clash with other factions! New movement and wound systems for grittier play, random terrain and environments, plus new stealth and city streets missions!

New material includes:

-Generate random table terrain setups with four different environmental types.
-An alternative wound system that can result in a wider range of effects when a character is hit.
-More detailed grim post-battle injuries for those who want a grittier game experience.
-An alternative movement system that divides the table into a 3x3 square grid and allows fast, open-ended movement.
-Faction rules. Now, you can work for various employers who will reward your loyalty as you do more jobs for them.
-Factions will also get involved in struggles with each other, making your planetary campaigns more exciting and dramatic.
-New Stealth missions featuring high-tension commando-style raids and infiltrations against sentries.
-Street fights take you downtown. Roam the streets of a mega city, undertaking missions, dealing with the locals and hoping you can make it out of there before the Enforcers show up and start arresting everybody.
-The package is rounded out with a new mission selection system that folds the new mission types into the core rules, allowing for any mission to be a street fight or stealth job.

Finally, a comprehensive campaign setup and campaign turn sequence summarise all of the options from all three expansions.

-description from publisher's website
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Measurement Movement, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Escape Room: The Game – Family Edition 3
description:
Race against the clock: you have 60 minutes to enter the correct keys on the Chrono decoder to escape. It will count down remaining time, and emit intense sounds to let you know you’re almost out of time. Can you escape?

3 exciting escape rooms with varying levels of difficulty."El Oro de Barbarroja" (The Legend of Redbeard's Gold), "Super Heroes Next Generation" (Super Heroes Next Generation), "La Fábrica de Dulces" (Candy Factory)

Compilation of three adventures, in other languages ​​they have been published in other formats. The other family edition boxes had a name but this one did not.
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Elapsed Real Time Ending
publishers: Diset S. A., Identity Games International B.V.

name: Triggle
description:
Their moves become your win in this territory-grabbing challenge! On each turn, players stretch a rubber band across four pegs. Whenever you complete a triangle, you get to claim it as your own with one of your tokens. Strategy skills will be stretched. Deception will be intertwined into every move. Do you have the brains to claim the most triangles and win? Discover game skills Pythagoras would be proud of with Triggle!

Triggle

Game of capturing territory by completing triangles
Encourages spatial reasoning, strategy, planning, problem-solving, critical thinking
Stretch rubber bands across four pegs per turn
When you create a triangle, claim it with a token
Claim the most triangles to win!
Includes game board, 4 token trays, 84 tokens in 4 colors


—description from the publisher

name: 天下归秦 (Qin's Conquest)
description:
Qin's Conquest is a thrilling board game inspired by Reiner Knizia's classic Age of War. Step into the shoes of a courageous general serving under King Ying Zheng of Qin in ancient China. Your mission: lead the powerful Qin army to conquer the six kingdoms, reshaping the course of history.

In Qin's Conquest, players strategically allocate dice to recruit soldiers, lay siege to enemy cities, and expand the influence of the Qin dynasty. Every roll of the dice brings new challenges and opportunities. Will you emerge as the most distinguished general, securing your place in the annals of conquest?
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Re-rolling and Locking, Set Collection, Take That
publishers: Gameland 游戏大陆, Yaofish Games

name: The Mix
description:
Are you ready to become a renowned mixologist? Create delicious cocktails to satisfy your customers. Improve your bar and gain experience! Get your shakers ready and show off your mixology skills!

The Mix is a captivating board game with unique components. It's the perfect recipe, combining deck building, resource management, actions, and worker placement. Get ready to be immersed in the exciting world of mixology!

As you play the game, your main objective would be to attract more customers, gain experience, improve your bartending skills, and eventually establish yourself as a well-known bartender. Along the way, you'll have to expand your bar to accommodate more customers, discover new recipes, hire employees, and purchase better quality alcohol.

The player who earns the most money wins the game.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Income, Market, Resource to Move, Simultaneous Action Selection, Worker Placement

name: Argent: The Consortium – Silver Shield HQ
description:
Originally available in Pack Bard from Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

Side A:
1-Immediately gain 1 Influence. While your Mage occupies this slot, all of your Mages are immune to Wounding. (slot requires Merit Badge)
2-Immediately gain 2 Mana. While your Mage occupies this slot, all of your Mages are immune to Banishing. (slot requires Merit Badge)
3-Immediately pay 2 Gold to gain a Merit Badge.

Side B:
1-Immediately gain 1 Research. While your Mage occupies this slot, when Wounded or Banished gain an Intelligence or Wisdom. (slot requires Merit Badge)
2-Immediately draft and Item. While your Mage occupies this slot, when Wounded or Banished refresh a Spell or Artifact. (slot requires Merit Badge)
3-Immediately pay 1 Mana to gain a Merit Badge.

name: Bites: Dice Tower 2023 Promo
description:
Originally available as part of Pack Druid from the Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

Ant-dulegence (1 star Wine)
Setup: Use only 3 Wine tokens. Do not place Wine in the first 1/2 of trail. Place small food tokens near Anthill.

Take a Wine: Place it beneath a small food token without a Wine.

Scoring: For each food with a Wine, the player(s) with the most matching food of that type score an additional 1/2 times their score for that food (rounded up).

Pheromones (1 star Special rule)
Requires Bites New Recipes
Set-up: Place the deck of food cards facedown in the mid-point of the trail.

Move an ant over the deck: Draw top card, look at it, and place it facedown near the Anthill. Place your choice of perfume token on it.

Scoring: If there is a space available, Positive perfume tokens move the matching ants one space up the Anthill; Negative perfume tokens - one space down. Ants may share spaces.

Ant-nado (1 star chocolate)
Setup: Set 2 Chocolate in the stack to be taken when moving onto the Anthill. Place remaining Chocolate as normal.

Play: Take a food token next to any ant. Turn that ant to face backwards. It takes its next move backwards, then turns facing forward. If there is no matching token backwards, the ant will move to the start of the trail and take the first token.

Also included are 3 positive perfume and 3 negative perfume tokens

name: Crystallo: The Tower Promo Card
description:
Originally available in Pack Cleric from Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

The Tower

1- Two Gems One Stone:
PLACE one card to complete two sets and place two gems

2- Over the Rainbow:
FREE the creatures in rainbow order (Firefox, Phoenix, Unicorn, Ice Wolf, Seas Horse, Faerie)

3- Speed Run:
WIN a game in 15 minutes or less (setup time not included)

4- Overachiever:
WIN the game with 5 or more cards remaining

5- Golden Opportunity:
COLLECT all 9 treasures in one game (riches bonus makes 10)

name: Merchants of the Dark Road: Starra's Fine Stables/The Delvers' Guild Promo
description:
Originally available in Pack Cleric from Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

Includes 1 double sided tile and 1 double sided card.

Starra's Fine Stables: Gain 2 lanterns and exchange your steed with one of the unused ones.

The Delvers' Guild: Move the ruins marker 2 spaces and gain the benefit. You may not roll the ruins die.

name: Monster Stunt: NeuroJoker Promo Card
description:
Promo card of the monster rider which was available only during crowdfunding campaign on CrowdRepublic platform.
NeuroJoker can act as a wild animal, or a robot, or a raptor, but rolls only 1 die.

name: Doomlings: Overlush Stretch Goals and Rebalance Pack
description:
This deck of cards includes all the stretch goals and a rebalance pack:


5 Description cards (not playable)
6 Kickstarter Exclusive holofoils (not part of the Overlush collection, marked "Special Edition | OVL")
6 Gene Pool Spirit Bear counter cards (1 per player)
5 Spirit Bear Trait cards
30 Meaning of Life cards
34 Rebalance Trait cards
5 Rebalance Age cards
4 Rebalance Meaning of Life cards
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Events, Finale Ending, Hand Management, Move Through Deck, Set Collection, Take That

name: Projekt Q: Vanvid
description:
Projekt Q: Vanvid is a cooperative game for 1-5 players based on Jussi Adler-Olsen's crime thriller series about Department Q.

This board game tells a rich story as players control the familiar investigators Carl Mørck, Assad, Rose, and Gordon through a week of investigation.
Mørck and Department Q delve into a dark chapter of Copenhagen's history in order to find a psychiatrist reported missing in a snowy March night.

It is not necessary to have read the books, and the game contains no spoilers for the plot of earlier or later books.

Projekt Q: Vanvid is the first game in a planned series of games.

In this series, participants collaborate to solve a cold case. The story begins on Monday morning and concludes no later than Saturday evening.

Can you solve the mystery before time runs out?

—description from the designer
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Storytelling

name: Trick Pages
description:
Trick Pages is a solitaire game in book form that challenges you to defeat monsters via trick-taking.

Initially the 25 cards in your hand have no effects — only their value as cards. The enemy monster plays cards automatically based on die rolls and a specified system. Win enough single-card tricks, and you defeat the enemy...then you have to fight the next monster with the cards remaining in your hand.

If you run out of cards before defeating all eight monsters, you die, at which point all of the cards return to your hand, all of the monsters respawn, and you return to the beginning of the book.

However, by defeating monsters you earn money, and you can use that money to purchase card effects, ideally allowing you to defeat monsters with fewer cards. Effects apply only to cards in hand, so if you've played strong cards already, you might have to wait until your next life to apply magic to them.

Monsters have different abilities, not just more life to defeat, so you need to develop tactics to defeat them, possibly by taking detours in the book dungeon to earn money through side quests. In the end, you must defeat eight enemies to win.

name: Clickport
description:
Clickport is a revolutionary strategic game in which players, acting as server room workers, will create patterns on the board using Ethernet cables. They can do this by plugging and unplugging different colored cables. The player who completes their pattern first wins the game!

—description from the publisher

name: Der perfekte Plan
description:
An exciting crime game for true master thieves!
Crime thriller experience paired with cooperative gaming fun: In “The Perfect Plan” an exciting story with a very special task awaits, because the players plan the perfect coup together. Your goal: to steal a painting by a famous painter from a museum. A variety of plans, maps and clues help the players to develop the perfect break-in plan to break into the museum undetected - and, in the best case scenario, to escape undetected with their loot. The team can make free decisions based on the clue cards, which provide an extra dose of thrill. An atmospheric, cooperative gaming experience full of teamwork, creativity and masterful planning.

name: Tal der Wikinger mini
description:
In the Valley of the Vikings, the annual barrel bowling tournament is about to begin. Are you brave enough to compete? By tactically playing your cards, you knock down the right barrels and thus cleverly position your game pieces on the dock. Only players who are well positioned can capture the most gold coins and sail away. Courage, tactics and a willingness to take risks are required, but players who risk too much on the dock and fall into the water will go away empty handed. The player who captures the most gold coins wins.

Contents:
42 playing cards (barrel cards and bridge cards), 24 gold coins, 4 wooden discs, 1 game manual.

name: National Pastime Next Generation NPNG+
description: A free baseball game that is very detailed and much user content. Contains physical cards and seasons you can print out. The web game also includes a method to play using the computer. The one item you do need is Excel.

name: Zap or Trap
description:
Zap or Trap is a game of sending secret signals.

Secretly communicate with your partner to ZAP a matching group aliens back home (even though they want to stay on Earth) or warn your opponents’ aliens that it’s a TRAP. Rules are so simple you'll be zappin', trappin', and dying laughin' in no time.

It's an excellent team game for 4 or 6 players. Variant rules will allow groups of 3 or 5 to play as well.

—description from the designer

name: Vinyl: Masters of Metal
description: The Masters of Metal version of Vinyl builds on the base game of Vinyl and introduces the basic collections and memorabilia. Historically, memorabilia (such as t-shirts and posters) was purchased for a favorite band. The memorabilia added value to the collector's collection. In MoM, players can acquire memorabilia and attach it to a collection. The memorabilia enhances the collections value (or length). In order to attach memorabilia, like icons (decade, live, picture disc) needs to be arranged so that the icons are adjacent between albums. The more albums and memorabilia the longer the collection. Unlike the base game, the basic collections only require the player to match bands and rewards players for long dedicated collections. MoM is compatible with Top Shelf, Publisher Expansion, and the Clearance Bin.

name: 午茶跳跳 (Tea Time Hopping Race)
description: Bunny and Chick are in a race. You secretly (and not so secretly) support one of them, and try to collect as many cakes as possible during each race. There are cakes to be collected during the race. If the contestant you support wins a race, all supporters share the prize. After three races, the player with the most valuable cakes wins.

name: Monster Stunt: CyberCross AI-1000 Promo Card
description:
Promo card of the monster vehicle which was available only during crowdfunding campaign on CrowdRepublic platform.
CyberCross AI-1000 can act as a motorcycle, a race car and a truck at the same time. Also any monster in the game can operate it.

name: Donut Shop: Blue Plate Special Pack
description:
It's never too early for dinner at the donut shop with this blue plate special. This promo mini-expansion includes two new ways to play. The first is the "Secret Orders" set of new orders. The other is a set of special X2 scoring bonus tiles.

Contains:

5 Donut Tiles
1 Four Pack Box Tile
5 Order Cards
2 Rules Cards

-description from publisher

name: Temple of Deception
description:
Temple of Deception is a fast paced card game that is played in quick rounds. The Expedition Leader starts the journey of each round and aims to capture the Jewel as all other players try to eliminate, deceive and take the Jewel for themselves.
Gameplay: Each adventurer starts with one card in their hand. On their turn, the adventurer will draw another card and play an action to try to gain an advantage over the other players. Each action is different such as elimination cards, trap cards and cards for the adventurer to gain additional knowledge on other players.

Strategy: Temple of Deception is packed with strategy. How and who you play your actions on will determine each unique round. Should you slow play a strong hand or should you go for the early win? Should you setup another player or chance it yourself? Be careful as other adventurers aren’t easily going to forget the next round and will be after you!

Winning: Can you collect all four Jewel fragments? Each round you win, you receive a Jewel fragment. Collect all four and you will escape the Temple of Deception with the Jewel and win the game!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Command Cards, Deduction, Drawing, Lose a Turn, Move Through Deck, Player Elimination

name: Avanti!
description: Time to go on vacation with your friends in Avanti! — but you will find out where you are traveling with the camper only if you combine the clues as to where you are NOT going! Whoever solves it fastest wins the most points...

name: garlic girls
description:
ガーリックガールズ (garlic girls) is a Kalah (mancala)- style game from Japan.

The players, as junior high school girls getting hungry after school, enter a mysterious Chinese restaurant called "Mancala-tei".
You can freely add toppings to create the ideal ramen, but take care to avoid eating too much garlic served by the hospitable manager and losing points!

On your turn, take your player token together with all the garlic tokens from one of the seven mancala plates arranged in a circle.
Then place these garlic tokens, one at a time, in clockwise order from the next plate, and place your player token on the last plate. Then you can draw a topping card from the top of the card pile next to that plate.

To achieve a high score, arrange the topping cards you have acquired in such a way that the patterns on the cards are linked on both sides of each card. When you do this, any garlic tokens remaining in your hand will increase your garlic level.

You lose points if your garlic level exceeds the upper limit or if your have 10 or more garlic tokens in your hand, so take care.

プレイヤーは放課後のお腹を空かせた女子中学生の1人として不思議な中華料理屋『満唐亭（Mankaratei）』が舞台となります。
自由に具材をトッピングし、理想のラーメンを完成を目指す訳ですが、サービス精神旺盛な店長から振る舞われるニンニクを食べ過ぎて、失点を得ないようにしましょう！
手番では円形に並べられた７枚のマンカラ皿から自身の駒とニンニク駒を受け取りります。
隣のマンカラ皿から順にニンニク駒を１枚ずつ置いていき、自分が欲しいカードが置かれたマンカラ皿に自身のコマを入れます。
手に入れたカードにはトッピングが描かれており、この絵柄が左右で繋がるように並べることで高得点を得られます。
このとき、手元にニンニク駒が残っているとニンニクゲージが溜まってしまいます。
このゲージが一定の数値に達する、もしくはニンニク駒を１０枚以上持っていると失点を得てしまうので、注意が必要です。
user summary
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Mancala, Pattern Recognition, Set Collection
publishers: Yureru tsubomi wo mederu kai (揺れる蕾を愛でる会)

name: Run or hide
description:
Attention, citizens! Your city is currently under attack by a UFO! The codes necessary to destroy the UFO are hidden in a secret Factory. Your mission is to retrieve these codes and install them while being transported by the UFO. This is the only way to achieve victory! Exercise caution, and good luck to all; you'll need it!

The codes are situated at the city's center. Each player must move their runners closer to the center while the UFO also traverses the city grid. At the end of each turn, the UFO initiates its beam. If you happen to be in the wrong location, you'll be beamed up and out of the game!

Additionally, you have the option to hide your runners in a house for one turn to remain safe and hidden. It's a race against time; the game ends once the correct code is installed in the UFO while being beamed up. Thus, you must approach the UFO while it moves, which isn't easy as it beams each round!"

description from the designer
categories: Deduction, Print & Play, Puzzle, Science Fiction
mechanics: Area Movement, Grid Movement, Movement Points, Storytelling

name: 16 lueurs d'hiver
description:
16 lueurs d'hiver ("16 Winter Lights") is a roll & write game designed and sold in aid of Accessijeux, a French non-profit organization dedicated to making board games accessible to visually impaired players. Only 1500 copies of the game has been made available, only sold by French webstore Philibert on 24/11/2023 (just like 61 Feuilles d'automne the previous year).

In 16 Winter Lights, roll dice and complete as many activities before Winter ends. Winter has come! Switch on your most beautiful string lights, look after the cute animals visiting your garden and build awesome snowmen.

Each turn, roll 3 6-sided dice (not included in the game). Use two of them to fulfil an activity, which each has its own rules! Use the last die on a light to get a permanent bonus! Be smart and try to score more points than your opponents.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Paper-and-Pencil, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Sunlantern Armor Promo
description:
This is a set of two promo cards, the Sunlantern Armor hybrid armor set bonus card, and the Sunlantern Mask gear card. They were included with the Sunlantern Armor - Aya miniature, which itself is not part of the game.

The Sunlantern Mask reads:

+ 2 movement

When a weapon with 5 or less strength is to the left of this, it gains Range: 4 and the thrown keyword.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Hazardous Movement Scenario Pack 3: City of Steel
description:
City of Steel recreates 1942-1943 battles both in and outside the city of Stalingrad.

Compatible with the Advanced Squad Leader game system, CoS utilizes two excellent maps: Valor of the Guards (VotG) and Red October to depict the fighting inside the city (7 scenarios), while 3 additional scenarios portray Operations Little Saturn, Uranus and Winter Storm (the attempt to relieve Stalingrad).

Finally, these scenarios can be played individually or as a "mini-campaign" in which each side accumulates victory points for both wins and achievements.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Turn Order: Time Track

name: Elevenses: Trolley Box
description:
Collectors box that comes pre-packaged with all the Elevenses family of games from Kickstarter of Elevenses: The Guilty Party.

Contains:
Elevenses: The Guilty Party
Elevenses for One
Elevenses Tea for Two
Elevenses

name: Monster Stunt: Promo Stunt Cards
description:
3 promo stunt cards which were available only during crowdfunding campaign on CrowdRepublic platform.
These cards are "Ride the Wave", "Monkey Flip" and "Spiral Jump".

These cards are also available for purchase directly from the publisher and given as promotional material on board game conventions.

name: ARIA: Masdar
description:
Each player has an identical deck of 10 cards. Thousands of combinations are possible, and you won't have a lifetime to test all your strategic ideas. No two games of ARIA: Masdar are alike: the dynamics of the game are notably different - but just as interesting - whether you're playing in pairs, threes or fours. three or four players.

In the first phase, each player must place his or her cards around the Source of Life, knowing that their position will have an impact on the rest of the game.

In the second phase, players compete using the effects of their cards, with the aim of eliminating or knocking out as many of their opponent's cards as possible.

Each card has its own special powers: some protect other cards, others move them, and some, like the assassin, can kill.
Egyptian-inspired, the artistic aspiration of the project is intended to be uniform and symbolic.

—description from the designer

name: Tiny Epic Vikings: Game Boy Geek Promo Card
description:
Originally available during the Game Boy Geek Season 11 Kickstarter campaign.

Card Ability:
Strength of 11 but costs 2 steel to play.
Leader action: Smite a Settler
Rune Actions: Sail a boat up to 3 spaces if you have 1 "Secrets and 1 "Nature's Fury" rune.

name: Construction Kids Board Game
description:
It’s time to start building! Get your team of builders and work together to complete a new construction project before the big storm arrives. The little builders are ready to collect the required materials from around the construction site and complete their project. But they better hurry! A big storm is on the way, and if the builders don’t finish the project before it arrives, all their work will be washed away, and they will have to start over.

In Construction Kids the little builders race around the construction site, trying to collect all the materials they need and finish their project before the storm cloud arrives. Players move across the board using numbered cards and collect their material tokens by collecting matching cards along the way. Work as a team to finish the project in time.

Construction Kids uses a bright and exciting setting that makes completing a construction project fun and imaginative. This cooperative game is the perfect introduction to basic counting, strategic thinking, and teamwork. Minimal reading makes this game perfect for kids ages 4 and up.

Box contains 1 game board, 4 builder tokens, 6 construction project tiles, 1 storm token, and 96 cards.

-description from publisher

name: Escape Room: Ancient Egypt Edition
description:
Travel back in time and embark on a high stakes Egyptian adventure from the comfort of your own home - ideal for family nights in the chillier months. The mighty pharaoh has been woken up from his eternal slumber and holds you responsible. Can you and your team work together to solve the puzzles in just 60 minutes and uncover the spell to restore his sleep in order to escape his curse? Aimed at a younger audience than our other escape room games, this adventure has an easy difficulty level and is suitable for ages 9+. A smart phone, tablet or watch is required for the interactive elements of this game.

Contents includes:
An Instruction booklet, 12x Game Puzzles, 8x Tracing Paper Sheets, 1x Notepad, 1x Interactive Ending and a Photobooth Frame.

name: Hunt A Killer: Whodonut? – A Murder Mystery Jigsaw Puzzle Game
description:
Fred Jackson Jr., the co-owner of Do Not Not Donut was killed behind the counter while opening up the shop. You will assume the role of a deputized detective trying to finish the work of ace investigator, Detective Frage. Along the way, you’ll put the pieces together to reveal the crime scene, answer the lingering questions in the Detective’s Notebook, and choose the right pieces from the Answer Board to fill in the blanks and solve the case.

Whodonut? isn’t just about putting together a jigsaw puzzle. This 1000-piece puzzle has a story behind it. First, you’ll solve the puzzle. As a deputized detective, you’ll also have a notebook that contains the details of the crime, information about the victim, and interviews with the three suspects. The notebook contains six unanswered questions about the case. Answer them correctly to complete the puzzle and solve the murder!

Difficulty: 1/5 (Easy).

Contents:
- 1,000 jigsaw puzzle pieces
- 6 blank pieces
- A detective’s notebook
- An answer board
- A solution envelope
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Deduction, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Outlive: Complete Edition
description:
Outlive and the Underwater expansion combined in a single box.

—user summary

2079 : Après une Guerre Nucléaire qui a tout dévasté, 4 clans de Survivants se terrent dans leur Abri souterrain. Leur seul espoir vient du «Convoi», une organisation qui recherche les Survivants les plus dignes d’intégrer les cités subaquatiques secrètes… où les places sont limitées.

Après des années d’absence, Outlive revient en boutique dans cette nouvelle édition complète.

Retrouvez tout le contenu original de Outlive, ainsi que celui de son extension Outlive – Underwater, et également le Mode Solo. Le tout, au même prix que le jeu de base à l’époque de sa sortie !

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement, Events, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Phase Order, Variable Set-up, Worker Placement, Different Worker Types

name: Hobiti: Nové pochoutky
description: New cards that can serve as an expansion to Hobiti and Hobiti: Dlouhé svátky. Not playable alone.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Humor, Memory, Party Game

name: The Magician
description:
The Magician is a solitaire game played with a 78-card Tarot deck. You play as the Magician, attempting to subjugate the remaining 21 Major Arcana and gain absolute power. Your tools are wands, pentacles, swords, and cups: the cards of the Minor Arcana, which allow you to control the four elements of nature. Four Major Arcana cards are dealt in a diamond pattern so that the Minor Arcana cards can be placed adjacent to them on each side. The player tries to subjugate one or more of these cards by surrounding them with a Minor Arcana card of each suit, the sum of which also exceeds the value of the Major Arcana card. The player can use the Magician card to activate special powers, including the power to change the suit of a card to a wild suit. When cards are subjugated, both the Major Arcana and the surrounding Minor Arcana cards are discarded. Some Major Arcana cards have addition requirements for subjugating them, and others offer rewards after being subjugated. There are also expansion cards which include even more requirements and rewards for greater variability. If the player can subjugate all 21 Major Arcana before the Minor Arcana deck runs out, they win.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Hand Management, Move Through Deck, Push Your Luck, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Match Trace
description:
Match Trace is a Print and Play paper and pencil "arcade" game that simulates sailboat racing.
Players take on the roles of skippers, each controlling a sailboat on a course represented on paper.
The game requires strategic planning, an element of chance, and tactical decision-making.
The core mechanic involves three dice, which are passed between players.
These dice determine the movement of the sailboats, with one die dictating forward (up or down) movement and the others controlling lateral movement, based on odd and even values.
Players must judiciously use their "knots" to reroll dice and thus influence their course, adding a layer of strategy to each move.
Interaction between players is a key aspect of Match Trace, mirroring the competitive nature of real-life match racing.
Players can strategically impede their opponent's progress by "covering their wind," a move that requires careful positioning and foresight.
Match Trace offers various modes of play, including single races, best-of-three series, and timed challenges.
categories: Dice, Nautical, Print & Play, Racing, Sports
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Line Drawing, Push Your Luck, Race

name: Apples to Apples Express
description:
It’s the game of hilarious comparisons, ready for party play! In each round, a new judge draws a Description Card. You’ve got to decide which card in your hand matches the Description in play, and hope the judge thinks your card is the best. And with so many cards in this version, it’ll never be the same game twice!

Filled with surprises and outrageous answers!

The judge plays a Green Apple card with a descriptive word on it.

From the five red apple cards in your hand, play the one that makes the best combination with the Green Apple card.

If the judge likes your combination the best, you keep the Green Apple card.

Collect four Green Apple cards to win!

Includes more than 500 cards, plus tray and instructions.
There are a few differences between this and standard Apples to Apples: players are dealt 5 cards instead of 7, they only need 4 green cards to win, and each green card has two options and the judge chooses the target adjective before players submit their cards.

name: Allá Juega con Ésta Billetera
description:
In ALLÁ juega con ÉSTA billetera ("THERE play with THIS wallet" A player takes a card and reads the phrase on the back, then leaves it in the center of the table.


Whoever covers the card first, and responds to the phrase with something that can include There, This one or whatever comes to mind, wins the card.
Whoever reads the card cannot cover, and who wins is the one who reads the next card.
The player who gets 5 cards wins the game.
If someone covers the card but gets stuck in his answer or says anything, he discards that card and must read the next one in the deck.


Includes 3 game modes and 80 trigger phrases to answer.
---
The deck of 40 cards is shuffled, and a random player takes the first card at the top of the deck to start the game:

Turn the card over, and read the phrase on the back (Each card has a phrase on both sides). Then, he leaves the card in the center of the table and within reach of all players.

Whoever covers the card first, and responds to the phrase with something that can include There, This one or whatever comes to mind, wins the card.

Whoever reads the card cannot cover, and who wins is the one who reads the next card.

The player who gets 5 cards wins the game.

If someone covers the card but gets stuck in his answer or says anything, he discards that card and must read the next one in the deck.

In game mode 2, 3 cards are dealt to each player. To begin, the starting player chooses two other players, and reads one of his hand cards to them. The one of the two who first covers the letter and answers something related to There or This, keeps the letter. The player who did not win continues the game, choosing two other players.
The game ends when there are not at least two players with a card in hand.
All players count the number of cards obtained. Whoever has the most cards wins the game.

For the third game mode, they can all be everywhere and not necessarily around a table.

One player will be the guide, and will say phrases from the deck of cards. The player who raises his hand the fastest will be able to answer the phrase, and keep said card. If more than one lifts at a time, the guide can choose who answers.

The player with the most cards in his can wins. In case of a tie, the victory is shared.
categories: Card Game, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: ハエトリ(Jumping Spiders)
description:
There is no door in this room. The human had been shut in for so long that the door lost its purpose and disappeared. At first, the spider disliked the human, unable to see the value in someone who lacked the courage to leave. But when the door vanished, it realized the human's true sorrow. The spider and its friends decided to work together to somehow get the human outside.

Every time the human moves, they leave trash behind. The spider diligently eats this trash, keeping the room clean. The consumed trash becomes nourishment, which the spider uses to spin the only pathway for the human to leave – a thread. It continues this every day, hoping for the day when its wish for the human to go outside will come true.

Unaware of the spider's earnest love, the human breaks the thread path the spider has spun. The game's system involves 'Route Construction + Destruction and Regeneration', where the spider spins threads that the human breaks. The system presents a harsh choice between strategic benefits for progressing in the game, or flavor benefits to enrich the human's life outside, through the 'Amida Spider System'. This system conveys a strong message to you. Do you want to win the game, or do you want to see the human start a new life?

—description from the designer
mechanics: Action Points, Cooperative Game, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Network and Route Building
publishers: ひとりじゃ、生きられない。(I Cannot Live By Myself)

name: Junk Drawer: Promo Goals
description:
A set of four goal cards to be used with Junk Drawer. Each card has one letter from the word "JUNK" and requires the player to cover all the spaces that make up the letter. Cards are:

J: Hard
U: Medium
N: Medium
K: Easy

name: Story Island
description:
Story Island is a story creation game for the whole family inspired by traditional Ibiza.

Made up of 64 cards, in each one of them you will find an illustration that represents some element of Ibiza culture and its traditional tales (people, places, animals, mythological beings, etc.) and a written element (emotions, actions, senses, qualities, etc.) useful for the creation of stories.

Inspired by them, you will have to invent a story avoiding the other participants to guess the cards you are going to use. In addition, you will have to guess the cards that the other storytellers will use in their story when it is their turn. And by using your imagination and intuition, you will get point cards to win the game.

A beautifully illustrated game with simple and easy to learn mechanics, but with a great balance of competitiveness-creativity that drives the creation of stories while maintaining enthusiasm and fun.

—description from the publisher

Story Island es un juego de creación de historias para toda la familia inspirado en la Ibiza tradicional.

Formado por 64 cartas, en cada una de ellas encontrarás una ilustración que representa algún elemento de la cultura ibicenca y sus cuentos tradicionales (personas, lugares, animales, seres mitológicos, etc.) y un elemento escrito (emociones, acciones, sentidos, cualidades, etc.) útil para la creación de historias.

Inspirándote en ellas, deberás inventar una historia evitando que el resto de participantes adivinen las cartas que vas a usar. Además, deberás adivinar las cartas que el resto de cuentacuentos usarán en su historia cuando sea su turno. Y usando así tu imaginación e intuición, conseguirás cartas de punto para ganar la partida.

Un juego bellamente ilustrado con una mecánica sencilla y fácil de aprender, pero con un gran equilibrio competitividad-creatividad que impulsa la creación de historias manteniendo el entusiasmo y la diversión.

—description from the publisher (Spanish)
categories: Card Game, Children's Game, Educational, Fantasy, Party Game

name: Les Voyages de Corto Maltese: Le jeu
description:
Cultivate your spirit of adventure and exploration in this family game and meet Hugo Pratt's most famous heroes!

Go on an adventure and be the first to get your hands on priceless treasures!

Following in the footsteps of Corto Maltese, explore an infinitely renewable boardgame. Meet Corto, Rasputin or even Bouche Dorée, avoid the dangers that the seas and oceans have in store for you, and be the first to discover mysterious treasures!

You will explore a board case by case, trying to avoid traps and to fin the treasure. But be fast, just the first to find it will keep it.

name: Der Vorstand will das so.
description:
A small card game for 2 to five players about the office madness. Everyone gets 5 employee cards in their hand, each with different powerpoints and special characteristics. There are three ToDos in the middle of the table, one of which can be completed by playing one or more employees. Fellow players can appeal and trump the current player by playing a single employee. ToDos won earn career points and the first person to reach a certain number of career points wins.

—user summary

Das Spiel für alle, die über ihren Bürowahnsinn nur noch lachen können ...
Stürzt euch in diese Kartenspiel-Gruppentherapie aus einem Unternehmen voller Kenn-ich-Charaktere und Ist-echt-so-Momente! Wo zwar alle arbeiten, aber halt gegeneinander. Wo alle geschafft sind, aber doch nichts schaffen. Wo einfach jeder eine Bürogeschichte zu erzählen hat.

Erledigt in einer Gruppe von 2-5 Spielerinnen und Spielern sinnfreie To-dos und sammelt Karrierepunkte, indem ihr die Macht der Vorstände und Führungskräfte gegeneinander ausspielt. Sägt mit zermürbenden Abstimmungsprozessen an der Karriereleiter eurer Bürogenossen.

Denn der Vorstand will das so.

—description from the publisher

name: Toe Sham Bo
description: Tic-Tac-Toe meets Rock, Paper, Scissors; get a line of your own rock, paper or scissors in a row. There are no ties, smash your opponent to win! Super fast, easy to learn, fun to play.

name: World of Snooker
description:
World of Snooker allows you to stage matches between the sixteen All-Time-Greats or current players who are World-ranked using the provided Ranking to Ratings Chart.

World of Snooker is an attempt to re-create the excitement of a world class snooker match. It is designed, in the usual replay game fashion, to be played solo but can equally well be played head-to-head. Whilst dice rolls clearly control the outcome there is room for some tactical play.

The simulation uses just three basic Player Ratings, Potting, Cue Ball Control and Break Building. A frame is played out shot-by-shot but the result of that frame can then be used to determine the score in frames for any session (from 3 to 10 frames).
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: MATICO
description:
Can Maths be funny? Yes!

In this fast cards game players compete for uniting colors and identify the signs, trying to be the first to solve the problems and getting the right answer.

name: Wandering Towers: Draw Two Cards
description:
PROMO 2022

Effect:
If you use this magic spell, you may draw the top two cards from the draw pile. You may not draw cards again until you have less than 3 cards in your hand at the end of your turn.

This promo has printed German and English rules, but the tile itself has no text.

name: Lacrosse Blast Express
description:
Lacrosse Blast Express uses the same cards and concepts as the full-play version (Lacrosse Blast) but in about ten minutes of game time.

This is primarily meant as a solitaire game, but has options for 2 players. The game plays over 24 segments of game-time with six segments per period. A roll of three dice dictates what happens in each segment and whether there is a scoring chance, a player quality check or a penalty check. Triples can also bring in player injuries, critical face-offs and fights.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: CATAN: New Energies
description:
It's the 21st Century, and Catan is at a crossroads. Long gone is the agrarian society of the island's Viking ancestors. Today's Catanians need energy to keep society moving and growing, but pollution is wreaking havoc on the island.

You must decide: Invest in clean energy resources, or opt for cheaper fossil fuels, potentially causing disastrous effects for the island?

CATAN: New Energies is a new standalone game rooted in classic CATAN mechanisms of harvesting, trading, and building. New gameplay elements including power plants, energy tokens, and environmental events that add new strategies and stories to a familiar foundation.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Modular Board, Trading, Variable Set-up

name: UNO: FAO Schwarz
description:
A variation of UNO based on the toy company FAO Schwarz.

Celebrating 160 years of toys, F.A.O. Schwarz continues to inspire awe and discovery for all children and the child inside all of us.
Force another player to draw 3 cards with the Special Delivery card!
And when you're down to your last card, don't forget to yell 'UNO!'

-description from the back of the box
mechanics: Hand Management, Lose a Turn, Matching, Take That

name: Naturopolis: Expansion Collection
description: A collection of expansions for Naturopolis.
mechanics: Closed Drafting, Cooperative Game, Layering, Solo / Solitaire Game, Tile Placement

name: Blackbeard's Treasure Hunt
description: Blackbeard's Treasure Hunt game helps kids learn colors, pattern recognition, and develop fine motor skills. Play as a pirate racing to unlock Blackbeard's treasure. On your turn try and match color cards in the correct order to follow your treasure map. If you match the correct color, fill your key by pushing it down onto the color's matching cube. Once you have filled your key in the correct order to match your map, use the key to unlock a 3-d treasure chest. You've won the game when the coins spill out of the chest to reveal Blackbeard's Treasure!
categories: Action / Dexterity, Children's Game, Memory, Pirates, Puzzle

name: Ditto
description:
A new form of Matching Card Game with higher challenge your memory. There are 2 Mode for play

The First Mode is "Matching"
Player has to matching the Couple of item card (Flip 1 by 1)
If the Player can matching the First Couple
You got the First Mission and then go the Mission 2

Before go to the Mission 2
take that couple & other 4 cards shuffle and lay down (Face down) like the same.

Mission 2
Player has to match the both couple in the straight
(ex. A - A then B - B .. if A-A then B-C .. It's over)
Pass turn to Opponent

The Player that finish Mission 4 First is win

The Other Mode is Put in Order
Player has to order Item follow the Mission
The one who can put in order follow the Mission First is win

—description from the designer

name: Kugelzoff am Weihnachtsbaum
description:
Kugelzoff am Weihnachtsbaum (German for "Ornament Quarrel at the Christmas Tree") is a microgame for 2 players in postcard format.

The game is played with brass and copper coins (e.g. 10x €0.10 and 10x €0.02) on a grid of dots and cones arranged in diagonal lines across a Christmas tree.

The coins represent Christmas ornaments and players take turns placing a coin on the tree. The first coin must always be placed on a cone. Each new coin must be placed in a diagonal line with the last coin. Two coins of the same color can never be placed next to each other.

The game ends when no more coins can be placed. Players score 1 point for each of their coins on diagonal lines with 2 or more of their coins. They also score 1 point for each of their own coins next to a light bulb of their preferred color (the color is determined by the side of the postcard they're sitting on).

The player with the most points wins the game. In case of a tie, the player who placed the last coin wins.

—description from the designer

name: Hell Under The Sea
description:
Hell under the sea is a solo war game where the player will command a German submarine from World War II. A single decision made can change the course of the patrol and the mission.

You can purchase it at https://www.wargamevault.com/product/464413/HELL-UNDER-THE-S...
​

Objectives

Complete as many waypoints as possible until turn 20.
Sink the greatest amount of tonnage.
Do not be destroyed while patrolling.


Preparation

Write the name of the submarine.
Mark the number of the mission to be played in the log.
Mark the difficulty of the mission in the log.
Mark on the turn counter at number 1


—description from the designer
categories: Nautical, Print & Play, Wargame, World War II

name: El Camino de Santiago
description:
El Camino de Santiago is the first board game dedicated to the Camino de Santiago; it's an inner journey and a sharing experience. From 1 to 5 players embark on a path composed of 31 stages, the evocative stops where various events, the unpredictable occurrences of the journey, must be faced.

The pilgrims progress by balancing mental strength and physical resources in an innovative path game, where the winner isn’t the one who arrives first but the one who has gained the most spirituality points.

As it happens in reality, you'll discover that reaching the goal isn’t enough; it's fundamental to get there in the best way possible!

The Path
The game includes all the dynamics of the Camino de Santiago, the route that connects, in nearly eight hundred kilometers, the French town of Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port to Santiago de Compostela, where the relics of the Apostle Saint James the Greater are venerated.

The route known as the Camino Francés is the most famous among the many paths that cross a large part of Europe. This itinerary, which from the Middle Ages to today challenges pilgrims from all over the world, has been declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO.

The locations along the Camino Francés are represented on 32 evocative large-format cards. Players can manage the length of the game from a minimum of 5 stages up to a maximum of 31. Additionally, there is the "catedral de Santiago" card, essential to complete the journey and receive the famous "compostela."

—description from the designer

El Camino de Santiago è il primo gioco in scatola dedicato al Cammino di Santiago; è un viaggio interiore e un’esperienza di condivisione. Da 1 a 5 giocatori intraprendono un percorso composto da 31 etapas, le suggestive tappe in cui si devono affrontare svariati eventos, gli avvenimenti imprevedibili del cammino.

I peregrinos avanzano bilanciando forza mentale e risorse fisiche, in un gioco di percorso innovativo, dove non vince chi arriva primo ma chi ha guadagnato più punti spiritualità.

Come accade nella realtà, scoprirete che non basta raggiungere il traguardo, ma è fondamentale arrivarci nel modo migliore!

Il Percorso
L’opera propone tutte le dinamiche del Cammino di Santiago, l’itinerario che collega, in quasi ottocento chilometri, la cittadina francese di Saint-Jean- Pied-de-Port a Santiago de Compostela, dove si venerano le reliquie dell’Apostolo san Giacomo il Maggiore.

Il percorso denominato Camino Francés è il più famoso dei tanti percorsi che attraversano gran parte dell’Europa. Questo itinerario, che dal Medioevo a oggi mette alla prova i peregrinos di tutto il mondo, è stato dichiarato patrimonio dell’umanità dall’Unesco.

Le località del Camino Francés sono state rappresentate in 32 suggestive carte di grande formato. I giocatori possono gestire la lunghezza della partita da un minimo di 5 tappe fino a un massimo di 31. In aggiunta, la carta de la catedral de Santiago, indispensabile per completare il viaggio e ricevere la famosa compostela.

—description from the designer (Italian)

name: Star Trek: Attack Wing – Independents Faction Pack: Adversaries of the Delta Quadrant
description:
With the Adversaries of the Delta Quadrant, pillage and hunt through the stars with 4 different independent ships: a Hirogen Warship, Nerada-Type, Numiri Patrol Ship, and a Vidiian Battlecruiser. Place a bounty on your opponent or even affect the reputation of their favorite starship with characters such as Kurros, Y’Sek, and Dala. Use new upgrades such as the Isokinetic Cannon and Refractive Shielding to provide a challenge for your opponent in the Delta Quadrant Campaign.

—description from the publihser
categories: Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Science Fiction, Wargame

name: Monsterrolle
description: Which little bathroom monster can roll off the longest strip of paper from the toilet roll? Lay your toilet paper cards smartly to form as long a row of cards as possible to collect points. But keep an eye on the others’ cards too. Maybe you can interfere somehow and tear their strip of toilet paper. The one who has the most points at the end, wins.

name: Pancake Picknick
description: It’s Pancake Picnic time at the zoo! The animals are really hungry and you’ve got the tricky job of getting the pancakes onto the picnic blanket! Take aim and throw your pancakes like the animals on the cards. Will your brilliant throws win you the game?

name: Scandinavian Big Box
description:
Scandinavian Big Box includes Copenhagen and Helsinki in their Deluxe Edition including two expansions each!

The Danish city of Copenhagen is traversed by canals and harbors, and part of it — "Nyhavn" (New Harbor) — is famous for the colorful gabled houses along the water.

In Copenhagen, players design new façades for these houses so that they fit seamlessly into this beautiful harbor setting. On a turn, a player may choose to take two adjacent cards from the display (they may never hold more than 7 cards), or use cards to buy facade tiles in various shapes and colors. Any tile may be purchased, but you get a discount if you place a tile touching another one of the same color. Building over certain spaces or completing designated rows grants the players new abilities to make their job easier. Finishing a row or column will award the player points (doubled if it is all windows), and the game is a race to 12 points.

The famous Senate Square in the center of the Finnish capital is surrounded by government buildings, the university, the cathedral and the Sederholm House. The players ́ task is to design pavilions across the square to protect pedestrians in the rain. Helsinki is based on the design of Copenhagen by the same design team, but with some added complexity.

The center board depicts the Senate Square with 8 spaces (two per side) and 8 cards, with each card connected to two spaces. The player on their turn advances their pawn 1-3 spaces, then must choose to take cards or build a pavilion. Each space is connected to two face up cards, and the player may choose to draw these into their hand (making sure to respect the 7 card hand limit, a key challenge in the game). The cards are in one of 5 colors and show a shape of size 2 to 5. To build a pavilion, the player plays a card showing the piece they want to play, and then must play an additional number of cards of the same color to match the size of the piece. Finally, the piece must be "slid" onto their game board (which also represents the Senate Square) from the side of the Square their pawn is on on the main board. Covering certain spaces earns a coat of arms, which may be spent to use one of the 15 one-time special actions.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Grid Coverage, Open Drafting, Pattern Building, Tile Placement

name: Iron Coffins: US East Coast Expansion
description:
Iron Coffins: US East Coast Expansion is a tactical-level, narrative-style solitaire wargame using a tables-based game engine simulating the German Kriegsmarine U-boat war against Allied shipping along the US East Coast during World War II.

As the captain of a Type IX U-boat during 1942-1943, your ultimate goal is to locate and sink as many enemy Allied ships as possible, while at the same time bringing your U-boat and crew safely back to base after each patrol. It won’t be easy due to persistent enemy aircraft and escorts continuously hunting your U-boat, but the German people are depending on you. Don’t let the Fatherland down!

The game includes the following components:

1 Tables Book (12 pages)
1 Tables Book Cover Page
1 Game Mat (A4 / 8.5 x 11)



Two D10, one D12, and one D20 dice are required to play.
5 minute game setup and breakdown times.
A medium size table is recommended for game setup.
Total play time to complete a full campaign takes approximately 4-6 hours, with a typical patrol averaging 30 minutes.
Adjustable starting difficulty based on player's skill level.


With most of the rules integrated into the tables, there is practically no learning curve or rules memorization. And with water depth rules, compressed air rules, oxygen rules, numerous crew skills, weather effects, random events, and a multitude of table modifiers, Iron Coffins: US East Coast Expansion offers memorable experiences and high replay value. Are you ready to serve the Fatherland and defend Germany against the onslaught of Allied shipping?

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Nautical, Wargame, World War II

name: Yark! Yuck!
description:
You have given yourself the challenge to be the most disgusting of your gang of friends.

Players must therefore collect series of 5 identical repugnant images. To get there, they make exchanges between them, while distrusting flowers that smell too good! We cannot complete a series with flower cards. On the other hand, flower cards can pass for any image during exchanges. In Yark!, There are no tricks: everyone plays at the same time.

Special challenges make the game even crazier and more chaotic that will take out the clown in you! Guaranteed laughter and disgust!

name: Dungeon Twist
description:
Dungeon Twist is a turn-based tactical dungeon crawler with simple rules, textless game pieces, and a great strategic depth. A gang of questionable rogues strays across the Shifting Dungeon, a procedural maze full of loot, dead ends, and pesky hazards. Trick your opponents, grab the Treasure… and get out alive!

-Build together:
The core mechanic consists in building the map by placing or twisting square Tiles. Every board piece can be manipulated in order to create new paths, spawn loot and resources, or lock up and slow down opponents. A unique and ever-changing scenario will come to life by collaborating with other players (or just messing up with their agenda).

-Grab that Loot:
Every player has a simple objective: get filthy rich and escape. Wealth can be accumulated by pillaging around or collecting combos of matching Tiles (that can be traded for Rooms), but most of all... you can just steal from other players. Robberies are settled with dice and allow to grab any Token from the opponent's inventory.

-Choose your Rogue:
Each playable character can drastically change your approach to the raid, thanks to their unique skills and wacky personality. But there's always room for customization: scavenge for Objects and Potions in order to cheat fate or unlock a variety of bonus effects.

-Escape in time:
When someone manages to collect a Treasure Token and take it out of the Dungeon, the endgame triggers. The entire map will crumble to the ground after just a turn, burying everyone still inside. Basically, you don't just have to be the richest in order to win, but also plan your escape route in advance.

-description from publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Modular Board, Movement Points, Pattern Recognition, Pick-up and Deliver, Pieces as Map, Tile Placement, Turn Order: Pass Order, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Strato
description:
In Strato, you play together as a team to overcome the game's increasingly complex challenges. Juggle the elements to meet the given conditions before you run out of cards.

In more detail, you take turns placing a card on the table and activating its respective effect. You can move the cards that are already present to place them in the right location, but if you don't have the elements under control, the effects can backfire.

name: Mystery Train
description:
All aboard the Oriental Express!

Test your powers of deduction in this classic whodunit mystery game!

A crime has been committed... and only you can solve it.
Play the role of a famous detective - from Sheerluck Homes and Missing Marbles to Hercules Parrot and Ivan Inkling - moving from carriage to carriage collecting clues and trying to fit the pieces of the puzzle together.

Classic family fun, it's a race to reveal who did the dastardly deed!

name: Masquerade Trick
description:
Tonight is night of the masquerade ball where the arrogant aristocrats and the commoners busy with their daily lives all wear masks to hide their identities. Some to fulfill their secret desires, some to fulfill their own mission... A dazzling night begins as various thoughts intertwine.

Masquerade Trick is a trick-taking game where you plays the roles of princesses, princes, assassins, and clowns, and perform trick-taking to accomplish the missions of their respective roles. Then, everyone points at the same time to the role card that they think is the person they are looking for.
user summary

Players play trick-taking as they complete missions for each character, such as princesses, princes, assassins, etc. After trick taking, players point to the character card designated for the mission. The player who completes two missions wins the game.
--description by publisher
publishers: Mysboard Games (ミスボドゲームズ)

name: BattleTech: Recognition Guide – IlClan Volume 33
description: The march of technology across BattleTech’s eras is relentless—but some war machines never die. This PDF-only series includes brand-new BattleMechs and OmniMechs, alongside Classic ’Mechs and combat vehicles from both the Inner Sphere and the Clans rebuilt with the latest technology to keep them competitive on modern battlefields. This series also includes in-universe development notes, battle histories, notable pilots, and record sheets for each unit.
categories: Book, Expansion for Base-game, Science Fiction

name: 7 Empires
description:
In Europe in the age of Ancien Regime in 7 Empires, 2-7 players compete for political and military dominance. They gain and lose shifting control over seven old empires, some of them more powerful than others: Great Britain, Kingdom of France, Kingdom of Prussia, Russian Empire, Habsburg Empire, Ottoman Empire, and Kingdom of Spain. Try to build up cities so that they can provide more and better military units: frigates, corvettes, infantry, and artillery, each of which has different military capabilities.

—description from the designer
categories: Age of Reason, Economic, Nautical, Political, Wargame
mechanics: Alliances, Moving Multiple Units, Turn Order: Claim Action, Variable Set-up

name: Fano Trick
description:
Fano Trick consists of 8 rules cards which, according to the rules, form the "smallest finite projective plane". In essence, each rule card lists several possible victory conditions for a player (e.g. win 0 tricks, win at least 1 trick and don't collect 4 suits.)

Players are dealt two such cards and pass one face up to their clockwise neighbor. Each player's goal is the common rule between the card they were passed and the card they kept.

The trick-taking is standard must follow.

The winner(s) are the players that achieve their goal.

name: てのひらダンジョン (Dungeon of palm)
description: Make good use of 18 adventurers and bring back many rewards from the dungeon. But be careful, someone may steal your reward once you get it. Win the battle with clever strategy in a palm-sized dungeon!

name: Complete Murder Mystery: Carefully crafted in Paris
description:
Players assume the character of one of 6-8 people. Over the course of the gathering, the players must mingle, converse, and consequently determine who is the murderer.

Each player is given a list of 6 statements that must be made during the game. These statements should lead the best investigator to the guilty party.

Presented in a classy whiskey-style gift box and includes six different plots, depending on the murderer's identity.

name: Whispers
description: Whispers is a quick-playing push your luck card game for 2 to 8 players, set in the Vinlant universe. It is presented as a New World version of a dice game from the Old World. The Whispers deck is an 8 suited deck containing 54 cards, including eight suits numbered 1 through 6, and six "Whispers" with a value of 0.
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Bids As Wagers, Push Your Luck

name: Family Feud: Gamestar+
description:
This all-new Family Feud Gamestar+ Edition of Family Feud brings the excitement of one of the most popular game shows of all time into your home. Invite your friends and family around and have a Family Feud Gamestar+ Party. Stream Steve Harvey right to your TV to ask your friends and family over 300 survey questions and reveal the answers - just like the real show. All you need is 2 or more people, an internet connection, and this game. Discover why Family Feud is one of the most popular game shows of all time. Does your family have what it takes to win? Survey says... yes!

—description from the publisher

name: Planet Rally
description:
Take control of all the planets before your opponents and use unique effects to hone your strategy and keep them at bay. But watch out for the ruthless pirates and other galactic villains who could jeopardize your mission! Are you ready to take control of the galaxy and conquer all its planets?

Players take alternate actions to steal planets from other players, conquer planets on their own and use special cards for unique effects. Each round a player can choose to gain a new planet or use the effect of one of his cards to manipulate the board.

—description form the publisher

name: Pixel Powers
description:
A deck building tactical and strategic card game for 1-2 players.

(VS)Deal 7 direct damage to the opponent
(SOLO) Defeat 3 waves of enemy Slimes then challenge the Boss

To play Pixel Powers (VS and Solo), you may Draft a 24 card deck, or you may pre-construct one. Players take turns - the objective is to as efficiently as possible use the resources, magic spells, item cards (and others) in your hand to pay the cost of Slime and Base cards that can be spawned onto the battlefield with a Health/Attack value. Hand and discard pile management are key, as well as a healthy amount of hoping to draw the cards you need.

Once spawned, Slime cards may attack enemy cards on the battlefield. Or when playing Versus, may attack the enemy player directly which is how to win! Base cards have powerful abilities that can be triggered each turn, and can quickly shift the odds in your favor.

(SOLO) Challenge 3 waves of enemy Slime cards, then flip over the dungeon and reveal the absurdly overpowered Boss Slime.
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Deck Construction, Hand Management, Multi-Use Cards, Open Drafting, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: The Traitors Card Game
description:
Trust no one in this darkly dramatic family game. Players work together to collect a hoard of golden treasure, but danger is lurking. Among you are Traitors - and every time Night falls there's a good chance someone will attempt to commit a murder under the cover of darkness.

Players start the game as either a Faithful or Traitor. Throughout, the Traitors murder people and the Faithful can try to banish the Traitors. Players draw cards into their hand and play them. Gold is added to the central prize pool which is split between the winners, but only if those winners are Faithful; Traitors will take it all for themselves. Banishments and murders can be carried out with the cards or with a web app provided by the developer.
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Deduction, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Party Game
mechanics: Deduction, Drawing, Hand Management, Hidden Roles, Voting

name: Host Your Own Escape Room: Ancient Egypt Edition
description: The mighty pharaoh curses all who disturb him... and in this escape room, that's you! Escape to Egypt, land of tombs, magic, sand dunes and disgruntled ancient mummies. For the next 60 minutes, you and your team must put the pharaoh back into his eternal slumber by solving the puzzles and revealing the spell to send him back to the afterlife. This high-stakes, immersive adventure game is an exciting family activity perfect for the chilly winter months.

name: 急屎鳥 (Poopy Dove)
description:
There is a pigeon in the village that often poops on the windowsills of the villagers and cannot be chased away. In order to keep their own windowsills clean, the villagers decide to lure the pigeon with birdseed to other people's windowsills. Thus begins a battle in which each household cleans up their own mess!

Fast paced party game for 3-8 players - the goal of this game is to not get DOVE POO on your windowsill!

name: Chocolate Clash
description:
Two-player simple abstract game featuring chocolate so real - there's numerous warnings not to eat it.

How to Play:

Place the chocolates randomly in a circle
Arrange the chocolate in the chocolate square box according to the rules.
If you can't legally place a chocolate, you lose and opponent gains hearts.

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Mirrorstone Earrings  & Fierce Paint Promo Cards
description:
This is a set of two promo cards, the Mirrorstone Earrings gear card and the Fierce Paint gear card. They were included with the Edlen miniature, which itself is not part of the game.

The Mirrorstone Earrings read: On Arrival, gain +★ vanity tokens.

The Fierce Paint reads: On Arrival, for each vanity you have, add 1 [armor] to each hit location that you are not wearing armor at or wearing armor with the swagger keyword.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Keyside
description:
Keyside is played over three years. Each year is divided into two phases: landing and resolving harbors.

In the landing phase, the lead player uses a die to move a boat into a harbor, then places a boatman, the die, and a worker into that harbor. Other players can join in.

In the resolving harbor phase, the lead player chooses a harbor to resolve that contains one of their workers. All players with workers in that harbor will gain a benefit such as gaining resources, animals, building a headland, access to farms, markets and skill tiles, worker movement and recruitment.

Players score points based on the harbor-scoring criteria multiplied by the number of their workers in the harbor. In addition, points are scored for headlands, skill tiles, and buildings in the player's village. The player with the most points wins.

name: 幻想のジュエル (Gensou no Jewel)
description:
"幻想のジュエル (Gensou no Jewel)" is a party game for 2-4 players that can be played in 5-15 minutes.

The rules are simple: you win when you make a set collection with gemstone cards in your hands.

name: Kabuto Sumo: Swarm
description:
The Sumo-beya are crumbling, and now factions have risen within World Insect Wrestling. With powerful insects and arachnids joining the league, new teams and tournament formats emerge. The Era of Swarms has begun.

In Kabuto Sumo: Swarm, you'll draft 3 Kabuto Sumo wrestlers for a multi-match swarm showdown. A different wrestler must enter the ring each match, but they can use the unique swarm moves provided by their ringside partners. Set up powerful combos and overwhelm your opponents!
categories: Action / Dexterity, Animals, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting

name: Ding!
description:
Can you get rid of all your cards? That's what Ding! is all about — but to do so, you will not only have to keep a close eye on the discard pile, but also on the other players at the table because what they do, consciously or unconsciously, decides which cards you can throw away. Someone is looking at their cell phone and you have the matching card in your hand? Shout "Ding!" and discard! Can you get someone to talk about the weather because it matches one of your cards? Excellent – that's a "Ding!", too!

—description from the publisher

name: Alles erlaubt
description:
The party game with few rules! Everything is possible here to explain or describe terms to your fellow players. Which player will guess the terms fastest? The aim of the game is to guess the terms described.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Das Partyspiel mit wenig Regeln! Hier ist fast Alles erlaubt um seinen Mitspielern Begriffe zu erklären oder zu umschreiben. Welcher Mitspieler errät die Begriffe am schnellsten? Ziel des Spieles ist es, die umschriebenen Begriffe zu erraten.

—description from the publisher

name: Safe and Hound
description:
Safe and Hound is a game of 18 cards full of clever combinations for scoring and play for 1 or 2 players. Players arrange the cards in the shape of a triangle and each turn will rescue one of the cards from the triangle which represents the mountain.
